NK084(yu)006:1: // sngags kyi spyi don tshangs dbyangs 'brug sgra zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
NK084(yu)006:3: sngags kyi spyi don tshangs dbyangs 'brug sgra zhes bya ba /
NK084(yu)006:4: dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK084(yu)006:5: chos rnams byed po ye nas rnam grol rang bzhin bzang //
NK084(yu)006:6: mnyam pa'i bdag nyid kun nas ma bslad mkha' dang mtshungs //
NK084(yu)006:7: chos rnams rang bzhin bya ba rnam dag dmigs med dbyings //
NK084(yu)006:8: yid chos byed dang bya 'gyur kun bzang yab yum 'dud //
NK084(yu)006:9: chos sku'i mkha' la gzugs sku rnam dag rol pa'i sprin //
NK084(yu)006:10: theg mchog gsang ngag sku dang rab ldan 'brug glog zab //
NK084(yu)006:11: gdul bya gang 'dul khro chags rnam grol char gyi rgyun //
NK084(yu)006:12: rgyud rab rlan byed zhi khro'i tshogs la dang bas 'dud //
NK084(yu)006:13: don gyi snying po gsang sngags rdo rje theg /
NK084(yu)006:14: tshigs don rnam bkra gsal bar nges bya'i phyir //
NK084(yu)006:15: rgyal dgongs ma 'khrul sngags kyi spyi yi don //
NK084(yu)006:16: cung zad bkrol gyi mkhas kun dga' bar mdzod //
NK084(yu)006:17: de la 'dir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
NK084(yu)006:18: dpal kun tu bzang po thabs mkhas la thugs rje
NK084(yu)006:20: chos kyii dbyings kyi pho brang chen po nas ma
NK084(yu)006:21: g.yos bzhin du rang bzhin thugs rje'i byin gyis rlabs
NK084(yu)006:23: sku gsung thugs lhun grub stug po bkod pa'i rgyan
NK084(yu)006:24: nyid du rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par bzhengs
NK084(yu)006:25: te / phyogs bzhi dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas thams cad
NK084(yu)006:26: kyi thugs rdo rje gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin
NK084(yu)006:27: gyi dkyil 'khor nyid las mi gzhan pa'i mnga' thang
NK084(yu)006:28: chen po la dbang bsgyur bas /
NK084(yu)006:29: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa 'bras bu sems
NK084(yu)006:30: dpa' rnams la zab cing rgya che ba'i chos phun
NK084(yu)006:31: sum tshogs pa gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa gsungs
NK084(yu)006:32: te / snang ba gsum gyis 'dul bar bya ba'i
NK084(yu)006:33: 'gro ba'i khams la rang bzhin gyis grol bar mdzad
NK084(yu)006:34: te / pa las / rgyal ba dgongs pa'i brgyud pa /
NK084(yu)006:36: gang zag snyan brgyud gsum las /
NK084(yu)006:37: dang po ni kun tu bzang po sangs rgyas thams
NK084(yu)006:38: cad kyi bdag nyid des dbang phyug chen po'i 'og
NK084(yu)006:39: min du 'bras bu byang chub sems dpa' brjod du
NK084(yu)006:40: med pa dang gnyis su med par bzhugs te /
NK084(yu)006:41: de nyid dang lhan cig pa'i 'khor rnams la zab
NK084(yu)006:42: mo'i dbang gsum bskur bas brjod bya don gyi rgyud
NK084(yu)006:43: rtogs te rang don du sangs rgyas so //
NK084(yu)006:44: de nas gzhan don du zhu ba zhu ba thun
NK084(yu)006:45: mong lam stegs gnyis pa'i phul bas ston pa thugs
NK084(yu)006:46: rje skyes te / gsungs pa zhal gyis bzhes te spro ba gnyis mdzad pa las /
NK084(yu)006:47: ston pa'i thugs rig pa'i ye shes kyi khyad par las /
NK084(yu)006:48: thun mong bca' gzhi'i ston pa drug spros te /
NK084(yu)006:49: thun mong lam stegs kyi theg pa mtha' dag gsungs pa dang /
NK084(yu)006:50: ston pas chos tshul 'di nyid 'chad pa'i tshul drug
NK084(yu)006:51: mdzad nas 'og min du gsungs pa nyid gnyis dus
NK084(yu)006:52: mtshungs par bstan pa'i rgyud tha dad par 'byung ba'o
NK084(yu)006:56: 'khor phun sum tshogs pa rgyas par bshad pa'o //
NK084(yu)006:63: a ka nish+tha'i sgra las dman par ma gyur pa'am
NK084(yu)006:64: 'og min pa ste gong mar gyur pa'i don to
NK084(yu)006:66: gnas su gyur pa gang zhig de'i gong na chos
NK084(yu)006:67: 'phags pa'i gnas gzhan med pa ste 'og min tsam
NK084(yu)006:69: chos sku'i 'og min gyi mtshan nyid ni /
NK084(yu)006:70: mthar thug gi bgrod bya'i gnas yin pa gang zhig gzugs sku gnyis kyi 'char gzhi'i rten byed pa /
NK084(yu)006:71: longs sku'i nges pa lnga ldan snang ba'i gnas su
NK084(yu)006:72: gyur pa gang zhig sprul sku'i 'char gzhi'i rten byed
NK084(yu)006:73: pa / sprul sku ni gtsang ma'i gnas gang zhig
NK084(yu)006:74: 'jig rten du snang ba'i gnas kyi mchog yin pa'o
NK084(yu)006:75: pa / // de yang 'jig rten gyi khams dang zhing khams kyi khyad ni /
NK084(yu)006:76: sprul skus gdul ba'i zhing dang /
NK084(yu)006:77: longs sku dang chos sku'i zhing khyad yod do //
NK084(yu)006:78: gsum dbye ba la gsum ste /
NK084(yu)006:79: chos sku longs sku sprul sku 'og min no //
NK084(yu)006:80: dang po ni mtha' dbus phyogs cha gang du'ang bzhag
NK084(yu)006:81: tu med cing spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i
NK084(yu)006:82: ngo bo sangs rgyas kyi mthar thug gam bgrod bya
NK084(yu)006:83: dam pa ste yang dag don gyi 'og min zhes
NK084(yu)006:84: bya'o // de skad du'ang kun byed las /
NK084(yu)006:85: ston pa chos sku'i gnas na 'di lta ste //
NK084(yu)006:86: 'og min chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang ste //
NK084(yu)006:87: yang dag don gyi 'og min de ru bshad //
NK084(yu)006:89: longs sku'i 'og min ni chos sku'i dbyings las ye
NK084(yu)006:90: shes chen po'i snang bar rang byung ba 'od kyi
NK084(yu)006:91: gzhal yas khang dang gtso 'khor du snang ba ye
NK084(yu)006:92: shes lnga'i rigs su lhun gyis grub cing dus thams
NK084(yu)006:95: gtsang ma'i ris dag spangs pa yi //
NK084(yu)006:96: 'og min chen po'i gnas mchog ni //
NK084(yu)006:97: rigs bdag phyag rgya lhun grub sku //
NK084(yu)006:98: gcig dang du ma rnam spangs pa //
NK084(yu)006:99: sangs rgyas kun gyi spyi gzugs te //
NK084(yu)006:100: gdod nas theg chen mdzod nyid phyir //
NK084(yu)006:101: sgrib pa mtha' spangs gdul bya la //
NK084(yu)006:102: skad cig gis ni gnang ba mdzod //
NK084(yu)006:104: de yang gtsang gnas spangs zhes pa ni de las 'das pa ste /
NK084(yu)006:105: 'jig rten gyi snang ba las 'phags pa yin gyi
NK084(yu)006:106: de'i ya rol na yod pa'i nges pa med de
NK084(yu)006:107: / sangs rgyas gang na bzhugs pa'i rang snang yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK084(yu)006:109: rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed sangs rgyas rnams //
NK084(yu)006:110: zhes pa'i rdul phra rab kyi nang na'ang mi bzhugs zhes mi bsam zhing /
NK084(yu)006:111: de na'ang lhun grub stug po bkod pa'i zhing rnam par ma 'gags so //
NK084(yu)006:112: de na'ang gnas kyi phyogs blos phyogs char chad pa gcig tu btsal mi dgos te /
NK084(yu)006:113: chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i dbang las /
NK084(yu)006:114: yon tan gyi khyad par gang du snang ba de nyid rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du shes par bya'o //
NK084(yu)006:115: de lta bu'i gnas de nyid 'og min chen po
NK084(yu)006:116: zhes bya ste sangs rgyas nyid kyi rol pa las
NK084(yu)006:117: gzhan gyi longs spyod ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK084(yu)006:118: des na rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs /
NK084(yu)006:119: mi bskyod pa rdo rje'i rigs /
NK084(yu)006:120: rin chen 'byung ldan rin po che'i rigs /
NK084(yu)006:122: don yod grub pa las kyi rigs te so so'i
NK084(yu)006:123: dkyil 'khor tshom bu nam mkha' dbyings kyi mthas klas
NK084(yu)006:124: par rang snang lhun gyis grub pa'o //
NK084(yu)006:125: de ltar snang ba'i sku dang ye shes kyi snang
NK084(yu)006:126: ba de yang gcig tu ma grub ste sna tshogs
NK084(yu)006:127: su snang zhing / du mar ma grub ste longs
NK084(yu)006:128: sku de nyid gcig gi rang snang yin pa'i phyir
NK084(yu)006:129: su snang zhing / ro // de lta bu'i zhing
NK084(yu)006:130: dang sku dang ye shes su snang ba ni sangs
NK084(yu)006:131: rgyas thams cad kyi rang snang longs spyod rdzogs pa
NK084(yu)006:132: sku'i spyi gzugs te thams cad kyi spyod yul ma
NK084(yu)006:133: yin la sangs rgyas longs sku rnams spyi mthun pa'i
NK084(yu)006:134: su snang zhing / ro // snang ba'o // de
NK084(yu)006:135: na snang ba'i gtso 'khor de dag theg pa chen
NK084(yu)006:136: po'i chos thun mong ma yin pa'i mdzod yin te
NK084(yu)006:137: su snang zhing / ro // snang ba'o // /
NK084(yu)006:138: sangs rgyas longs spyod rdzogs sku'i ngang yin pa'i phyir
NK084(yu)006:139: su snang zhing / ro // snang ba'o // /
NK084(yu)006:140: ro // de ltar snang ba de yang sgrib pa
NK084(yu)006:141: mtha' dag spangs pa'i skad cig de nyid chos sku
NK084(yu)006:142: dang snga phyi mi phyed par snang ba yin no
NK084(yu)006:143: su snang zhing / ro // snang ba'o // /
NK084(yu)006:144: ro // // gdul bya la snang zhes pas sa
NK084(yu)006:145: thob pa'i spyod yul ma yin te /
NK084(yu)006:146: sgrib pa mtha' dag spangs zhes pa de ma tshang ba'i phyir ro //
NK084(yu)006:147: gnas de'i yon tan snang tshul ni /
NK084(yu)006:150: nyis 'gyur du ni dpags pa yin //
NK084(yu)006:151: ngo bo mtha' gsum las 'das pa //
NK084(yu)006:152: yon tan lnga yi bdag nyid de //
NK084(yu)006:153: ma spangs rgyan rdzogs gzhal yas khang //
NK084(yu)006:154: gru bzhi spyi bo 'khyil pa gnas //
NK084(yu)006:156: longs sku'i rang snang dag pa'i zhing khams yin pas na /
NK084(yu)006:158: sar gnas kyi snang ba rang bzhin sprul sku'i 'og min gnyis las snang ba de nyid 'phags so //
NK084(yu)006:159: de lta bu'i zhing gi ngo bo yod med rtag chad spros pa'i mtha' gsum las 'das shing /
NK084(yu)006:160: sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las mi zad pa
NK084(yu)006:161: rgyan gyi 'khor lo'i yon tan lnga'i rang bzhin can
NK084(yu)006:162: snang ba'i rgyan phul du phyin pas spras pa'i gzhal
NK084(yu)006:163: med khang nam mkha'i dbyings kun tu khyab par snang
NK084(yu)006:164: ba'o // de yang gang du dbyings dang ye shes
NK084(yu)006:165: gnyis su med par 'dres pa'i gnas de nyid du
NK084(yu)006:166: sangs rgyas longs sku'i snang ba de nyid 'char ba
NK084(yu)006:167: ba'o // yin te / dbu ma chos dbyings su bstod pa las //
NK084(yu)006:168: dbang phyug chen po'i gnas mchog dang //
NK084(yu)006:169: 'og min de nyid rnam mdzes pa //
NK084(yu)006:170: shes pa gsum pa gcig nyid du //
NK084(yu)006:173: dbang phyug chen po ni longs sku nyid de chos
NK084(yu)006:174: thams cad kyi 'byor pa dam pa la dbang bsgyur
NK084(yu)006:175: ba'i phyir ro // de lta bu nyid sangs rgyas
NK084(yu)006:176: thams cad kyi longs spyod rdzogs pa sku spyi'i snang
NK084(yu)006:177: ba yin pas snang ba mi 'dra ba tha dad
NK084(yu)006:179: rgyal ba so sos byang chub brnyes pa'i longs sku'i
NK084(yu)006:180: zhing cha nas longs sku'i khams so sor phye ba
NK084(yu)006:183: bdag tu 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir //
NK084(yu)006:184: gnas la tha dad yod ma yin //
NK084(yu)006:185: sngon gyi rjes su 'brang bas kyang //
NK084(yu)006:186: de la dgag pa tha dad 'byed //
NK084(yu)006:188: de ltar rang snang longs sku'i zhing du sangs ma
NK084(yu)006:189: rgyas na 'jig rten du sgron ma bkod pa nas
NK084(yu)006:190: 'gro ba'i don mdzad mi nus te /
NK084(yu)006:191: rgyan stug po bkod pa'i mdo las /
NK084(yu)006:192: yang dag sangs rgyas 'og min du //
NK084(yu)006:193: sangs rgyas ma gyur 'dod khams su //
NK084(yu)006:194: sangs rgyas mdzad pa mi mdzad do //
NK084(yu)006:196: de nyid rgyal ba khams gsum las 'das pas gnas kyang de'i sgras brjod de /
NK084(yu)006:198: gzugs med 'dod dang gzugs rnams dang //
NK084(yu)006:199: 'du shes med pa de bzhin te //
NK084(yu)006:200: gnas las 'das so sangs rgyas dbang //
NK084(yu)006:201: bzhugs so stug po'i dkyil 'khor na //
NK084(yu)006:202: zhes sogs gnas der rang snang dag pa'i dkyil 'khor la /
NK084(yu)006:203: rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po a ti yo ga'i
NK084(yu)006:204: chos phun sum tshogs pa rang bzhin byin gyis rlabs
NK084(yu)006:205: kyis thugs sems dpa' la ston pa kun tu bzang
NK084(yu)006:206: po nyid longs skur snang bas gsungs te /
NK084(yu)006:208: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du gleng ngo zhes pa dang /
NK084(yu)006:209: gzhan las kyang tshul de dang mthun par gsungs so //
NK084(yu)006:210: gsum pa sprul sku'i 'og min la gnyis te /
NK084(yu)006:211: gdul bya sa la gnas pa'i don du rang bzhin
NK084(yu)006:212: sprul sku'i zhing dang 'dres ma'i don du gtsang ma
NK084(yu)006:215: dbus na 'og min khang bu brtsegs pa'i stug po bkod pa /
NK084(yu)006:216: shar na mngon par dga' ba /
NK084(yu)006:217: lho na rin po ches brgyan pa /
NK084(yu)006:219: byang na las rab grub pa'i zhing lngar 'khor sa bcu'i sems dpa' la /
NK084(yu)006:220: ston pa rigs lnga'i chos theg pa chen po thun
NK084(yu)006:221: mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i rnam grangs zhal
NK084(yu)006:222: dang ljags las 'od zer 'phros pa'i rtse las rang
NK084(yu)006:223: snang zhing / me long lta bu'i snang bas sgrib pa sbyang bar 'dod de /
NK084(yu)006:225: 'og min bla med gnas mchog tu //
NK084(yu)006:226: sku ni rnam par snang mdzad tshul //
NK084(yu)006:227: byang chub sems dpa' 'khor rnams la //
NK084(yu)006:228: de bzhin gsung mchog mi smra ste //
NK084(yu)006:229: sku yis chos rnams 'jal bar ston //
NK084(yu)006:230: me long bstan pa'i tshul bzhin du //
NK084(yu)006:231: dngos kyi mdog ngan thams cad sel //
NK084(yu)006:232: 'khor gyi de bzhin sku bltas na //
NK084(yu)006:233: byang chub sgrib pa gting dpag med //
NK084(yu)006:234: me long bzhin du sku la snang //
NK084(yu)006:235: de nas sa bcu rim gyis 'byong //
NK084(yu)006:236: blo med byang chub yang dag thob //
NK084(yu)006:238: dus ni mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo ste rtag par ro //
NK084(yu)006:239: khyad par du zhi ba dang khro bo'i dkyil 'khor
NK084(yu)006:240: rigs lnga mngon par snang bas rnal 'byor dang rnal
NK084(yu)006:241: 'byor chen po'i theg pa gsungs so //
NK084(yu)006:242: zhing de yang 'jig rten las 'phags pas steng zhes brjod de /
NK084(yu)006:244: ston pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i gnas bstan pa /
NK084(yu)006:245: 'jig rten mtshan ma kun gyi steng gyur pa //
NK084(yu)006:246: gnas kyi 'og min khang bu brtsegs pa yi //
NK084(yu)006:247: gzhal yas khang de gnas kyi 'og min bshad //
NK084(yu)006:251: ston pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor bstan pa //
NK084(yu)006:252: mos spyod bzhi yi sa las 'das pa yi //
NK084(yu)006:253: dang po rab tu dga' ba'i sa mnan nas //
NK084(yu)006:254: sa bcu chos kyi sprin gyi sa pa rnams //
NK084(yu)006:255: de ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor du bstan //
NK084(yu)006:257: chos kyang sku dang ye shes kyi dgongs pas ston te /
NK084(yu)006:259: ye shes longs spyod 'og min bzhugs pa yi //
NK084(yu)006:260: sa bcu pa yi byang chub sems dpa' la //
NK084(yu)006:261: byang chub sems te sku dang ye shes bshad //
NK084(yu)006:263: ji ltar bshad na de la /
NK084(yu)006:264: longs spyod rdzogs sku rang gi ngo bos ston //
NK084(yu)006:266: gnyis pa 'dres ma'i tshul du gtsang ris kyi 'og min bstan pa ni /
NK084(yu)006:267: mi mjed la sogs pa 'gro ba sems can gyi
NK084(yu)006:268: snang ba dang mthun pa'i gnas kyi mchog rang rang
NK084(yu)006:269: gi 'jig rten de'i gzugs kyi khams bsam gtan bzhi
NK084(yu)006:270: pa'i gtsang ma ris kyi lha lnga'i gnas kyi 'og
NK084(yu)006:271: min rags pa'i dngos po ma yin pa /
NK084(yu)006:272: dang ba 'od kyi rang bzhin las grub pa'i gnas /
NK084(yu)006:273: gzhal yas khang la sogs pa bkod pa'i bye brag sna tshogs pas brgyan pa der /
NK084(yu)006:274: 'jig rten du sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshe sprul pa'i
NK084(yu)006:275: dang po longs sku dang chos mthun pa mtshan dpes
NK084(yu)006:276: brgyan pa'i sangs rgyas su bstan nas /
NK084(yu)006:277: lha dang grub pa dang rigs sngags 'chang gi dbang po tshad med pa la bya ba dang /
NK084(yu)006:279: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud la sogs pa dang /
NK084(yu)006:280: pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i theg pa du mas 'dul bar kun tu ston te /
NK084(yu)006:281: de skad du'ang legs par grub pa'i rgyud las /
NK084(yu)006:282: gtsang ma'i 'og min rnam mdzes par //
NK084(yu)006:283: grub pa dbang po la sogs pa //
NK084(yu)006:284: rigs sngags gzungs sngags rnal 'byor dang //
NK084(yu)006:285: rgyud chos du mas tshim par mdzad //
NK084(yu)006:287: gzhan yang slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad pa'i spyan 'grel las /
NK084(yu)006:288: don gyi 'og min chos kyi dbyings te sangs rgyas
NK084(yu)006:289: bzhugs gnas yin zhing de'i gong na gzhan med pa'i
NK084(yu)006:290: phyir ro // rtags kyi 'og min dbyings dang ye
NK084(yu)006:291: shes dbyer med kyi rtags su gzhal yas khang gi
NK084(yu)006:292: dbyibs dang kha dog tu snang ba ste longs spyod
NK084(yu)006:293: rdzogs sku'i bzhugs gnas yin zhing chos kyi dbyings mtshon
NK084(yu)006:294: byed kyi rtags de'i gong na gzhan med pa'i phyir
NK084(yu)006:295: phyir ro // ro // rig pa'i 'og min dngos
NK084(yu)006:296: po'i gnas lugs ji lta ba bzhin rtogs pa rig
NK084(yu)006:298: dag pa gnyis ldan gyi chos sku'i bzhugs gnas yin
NK084(yu)006:299: zhing de'i gong na rig pa gzhan med pa'i phyir
NK084(yu)006:300: ro // gsang ba'i 'og min yum gyi mkha' ste /
NK084(yu)006:301: gsang ba sku'i bzhugs gnas yin /
NK084(yu)006:302: mi gnas yon tan gong na gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
NK084(yu)006:303: rtogs pa'i 'og min las dang po pas 'og min gyi gzhal yas khang bsgom pa ste /
NK084(yu)006:304: lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi bzhugs gnas yin zhing /
NK084(yu)006:305: don spyi 'dzin byed kyi rtog pa de'i gong na gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
NK084(yu)006:306: 'jig rten gnas kyi 'og min gtsang ma ris kyi lha lnga'i ya steng ste /
NK084(yu)006:307: 'phags pa rnams kyi bzhugs gnas yin zhing gzugs khams
NK084(yu)006:308: kyi gnas de'i gong na gzhan med pa'i phyir ro
NK084(yu)006:309: // zhes pa'i don drug 'byung yang snga ma'i khongs su 'du ste /
NK084(yu)006:310: don dang rig pa'i 'og min chos skur 'du zhing /
NK084(yu)006:311: rtags kyi longs sku gzhan gsum sprul skur 'du ste /
NK084(yu)006:314: rtogs pa'i 'og min ni sprul sku'i lam nyams su len pas de'i khongs su 'adu'o //
NK084(yu)006:315: bzhi pa rtsod pa spang ba ni /
NK084(yu)006:316: rgyud gsungs pa'i gnas rang snang longs sku'i zhing du
NK084(yu)006:317: gdul bya rang rgyud pa med na chos bstan pa'i
NK084(yu)006:319: don rtags kyi dkyil 'khor yang gdul bya la bstan
NK084(yu)006:320: gyi rang gi thugs kyi sprul pa la bstan mi
NK084(yu)006:321: dgos te / sprul pa la rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
NK084(yu)006:322: de nas rang rgyud pa'i 'khor dang sprul pa gnyis ka'o zhes zer ro //
NK084(yu)006:323: de ni khyad kyi dgongs pa ma lon par snang ste /
NK084(yu)006:324: sprul pa'i gdul bya yod pa'i chos bstan pa'i dgos
NK084(yu)006:325: pa yod de phyi rabs gsang bdag gis 'chad pa'i
NK084(yu)006:326: dgos pa yod pa'i phyir dang /
NK084(yu)006:327: don rtags kyi ched du gdul bya la bstan pa
NK084(yu)006:328: ma yin gyi rang snang la longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
NK084(yu)006:329: yon tan lhun rdzogs su shar ba ste me long
NK084(yu)006:330: gi ngos la gzugs brnyan snang ba bzhin no //
NK084(yu)006:331: sprul pa la rtog pa med kyang ye shes yod
NK084(yu)006:332: pas de nyid kyis chos nyan zhing 'dzin par byed
NK084(yu)006:333: do // gal te sprul pa la rig pa'i ye
NK084(yu)006:334: shes med na sh+aakya thub pa dang gsang bdag la
NK084(yu)006:335: sogs pa'i ji lta ba ji snyed pa mkhyen pa'i
NK084(yu)006:336: ye shes mi mnga' bar thal ba'i skyon yod de
NK084(yu)006:337: do // / lung gis kyang gnod de /
NK084(yu)006:338: de bzhin thugs kyi khyad par las //
NK084(yu)006:339: rang snang rgyal ba'i sems rdzogs dang //
NK084(yu)006:341: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du gleng ngo //
NK084(yu)006:343: de bzhin nyid kyis dbyings nyid dbang bsgyur ye shes dkyil 'khor thugs rje'i ngang //
NK084(yu)006:344: rang snang ba nyid ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan sgyu ma rnam dag gsal ba ni //
NK084(yu)006:345: zhes pa la sogs pas gnod /
NK084(yu)006:346: mdor na sangs rgyas kyi sku gsum dang rnam par
NK084(yu)006:347: 'phrul pa dang zhing khams bsam gyis mi khyab cing
NK084(yu)006:348: tshad med de / sdong po bkod pa las /
NK084(yu)006:349: spu yi rtse mo gcig la yang //
NK084(yu)006:350: zhing rnams bye ba bsam mi khyab //
NK084(yu)006:351: sna tshogs dbyibs kyang tha dad de //
NK084(yu)006:352: de dag 'dres par gyur pa med //
NK084(yu)006:354: nam mkhas gang du khyab par chos sku dang longs skus khyab cing /
NK084(yu)006:355: sems can gyis gang du khyab par sprul pa'i sku
NK084(yu)006:356: dang phrin las kyis khyab pas bde bar gshegs pa'i
NK084(yu)006:357: zhing khams la phyogs dang ris su chad pa med
NK084(yu)006:358: / zhing 'di nyid kyi gong na gzhan dag bsam
NK084(yu)006:359: gyis mi khyab pa brjod kyis mi long ba yod
NK084(yu)006:361: ma dag par snang ba yang rang gi snang ba
NK084(yu)006:362: tsam las dag pa'i zhing du blta bar bya ste
NK084(yu)006:363: / nyi zla'i snang ba dag pa ma yin mod kyi /
NK084(yu)006:364: dmus long rnams kyis ma mthong ba bzhin du shes par bya'o //
NK084(yu)006:365: rnam par gzhag pa 'di ni shin tu dka' ba'i gnas te gsal bar bstan pa yin no //
NK084(yu)006:366: gnyis pa rig 'dzin brgyud pa yang gnyis las /
NK084(yu)006:367: rig 'dzin mi ma yin pa'i brgyud pa ni /
NK084(yu)006:368: ston pa nyid kyi sprul pa rigs gsum du snang bar mdzad de /
NK084(yu)006:369: lha klu gnod sbyin gsum la brgyud pa yang /
NK084(yu)006:370: 'jam dpal mkhyen pa'i mnga' bdag tu gyur pa ni /
NK084(yu)006:371: gtso bor zab mo'i phyogs kyi 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa las lta ba'i phyogs ston /
NK084(yu)006:372: spyan ras gzigs thugs rje'i mnga' bdag tu gyur te /
NK084(yu)006:373: gtso bor byams snying rjes bskyab pa'i phyogs kyi don mdzad pa sgrub pa'i phyogs ston /
NK084(yu)006:374: phyag na rdo rje mthu stobs kyi mnga' bdag tu gyur te /
NK084(yu)006:375: gtso bor thabs mkhas pa'i drag shul phyogs kyi don mdzad pas spyod pa'i phyogs ston /
NK084(yu)006:376: kha cig re res kyang lta sgrub spyod pa gsum ka bstan par bzhed de /
NK084(yu)006:377: de yang 'jam dpal gzhon tshul mdzes pa'i sku dang ldan pas /
NK084(yu)006:378: lha rnams kyi lus dang bsam pa dang mthun par
NK084(yu)006:379: bstan te lha gnas su grags pa na phyogs skyong
NK084(yu)006:380: la bshad / des lha tshangs pa rin chen 'od 'bar la /
NK084(yu)006:381: des lha tshangs pa skye dgu'i bdag /
NK084(yu)006:384: des lha dbang brgya byin la /
NK084(yu)006:386: lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul 'dzin zhing sangs rgyas kyi gdung sob par 'gyur ro //
NK084(yu)006:387: spyan ras gzigs bdud rtsi sman gyi sku dang ldan pa des /
NK084(yu)006:388: klu gdug pa can gyi lus dang bsam pa dang
NK084(yu)006:389: mthun par klu rgyal rigs g+h+ri na nag po la
NK084(yu)006:390: bstan / des klu mo ma ma kha 'dul /
NK084(yu)006:393: des tshom bu 'bum sde la bshad de sngar bzhin du gyur to //
NK084(yu)006:394: phyag na rdo rjes 'jigs tshul bsdigs pa'i sku dang
NK084(yu)006:395: ldan pas gnod sbyin gyi gnas su gnod sbyin gyi
NK084(yu)006:396: lus dang bsam pa dang mthun par gnod sbyin kun
NK084(yu)006:398: des gnod sbyin grags ldan chos skyong la /
NK084(yu)006:399: des gnod sbyin tshom bu 'bum sde la bshad de sngar bzhin du gyur to //
NK084(yu)006:400: gnyis pa rig 'dzin mi dang mi ma yin gnyis la brgyud pa ni /
NK084(yu)006:401: sangs rgyas sh+aakya thub pa mya ngan las 'das par dgongs nas 'khor bsdus te /
NK084(yu)006:402: the tshom chod cig par bskul bas 'khor gyi nang
NK084(yu)006:403: nas rig 'dzin gyi rgyal po ku dza ra zhes
NK084(yu)006:404: bya ba stan las langs te /
NK084(yu)006:405: dri ba lnga dris pa'i dang po gsang sngags nam 'byung zhes pa'i lan du /
NK084(yu)006:406: spyir byung tshul bcu gnyis kyis the tshom 'byung bar lung bstan pa las /
NK084(yu)006:407: khyad par lung che nges par bstan pa'i tshul las /
NK084(yu)006:408: nga ni 'di nas mi snang nas //
NK084(yu)006:409: lo ni brgya dang bcu gnyis nas //
NK084(yu)006:410: lha gnas gsum du grags pa yi //
NK084(yu)006:411: bstan pa'i snying po dam pa zhig /'dzam gling shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi //
NK084(yu)006:412: mi las skal ldan rigs can te //
NK084(yu)006:413: rgyal po dza zhes bya ba la //
NK084(yu)006:414: sngon du ltas snang snang gyur pa //
NK084(yu)006:415: drag shul can zhes bya ba'i rtser //
NK084(yu)006:416: grogs kyi sems can dman pa'i lus //
NK084(yu)006:417: long ka'i bdag po la sogs la //
NK084(yu)006:418: lag na rdo rjes gnang bar 'gyur //
NK084(yu)006:419: zhes lung bstan te mya ngan las 'das so //
NK084(yu)006:420: de lo nyi shu rtsa brgyad nas dam pa'i rigs
NK084(yu)006:421: can lnga nang du mnyam par 'jog pa las langs
NK084(yu)006:422: pa dang / 'jig rten gyi ston pa nub par gyur pas rmag chad par ngus so //
NK084(yu)006:423: kun kyang rang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi bya bas
NK084(yu)006:424: za hor gyi yul khams zhes bya ba'i nye 'khor
NK084(yu)006:425: na / dpal phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyis bcags pa /
NK084(yu)006:426: ri ma la ya gnam lcags yod pa'i rtse zhes bya ba zhig na /
NK084(yu)006:427: rtse mo na ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ges 'khrab par gyur pa /
NK084(yu)006:428: 'dabs shod na gcan gzan stag gi phreng ba yod pa /
NK084(yu)006:429: rtsa ba dang sdong po shun pa pags pa lo
NK084(yu)006:430: ma 'bras bu sman sna tshogs kyi shing skyes pa
NK084(yu)006:431: / ngos la brag dkar po seng ges khyi tshugs
NK084(yu)006:432: bca' ba 'dra ba yod pa de'i rtse la 'dus
NK084(yu)006:433: / te / shin tu nyam thag pa'i nga ros
NK084(yu)006:434: gdung ba gsum gsum bton pas phyogs bcu'i rgyal bas
NK084(yu)006:435: / te / gsan nas / thams cad kyis gsang ba'i bdag po la bskul bas /
NK084(yu)006:436: gsang ba'i bdag pos rigs can lnga la mngon sum
NK084(yu)006:437: du snang bar mdzad nas lha'i rigs grags ldan phyogs
NK084(yu)006:440: srin po blo gros thabs ldan /
NK084(yu)006:441: mi las skal ldan dge slong li tsa b+ai dri ma med par grags pa zhes bya'o //
NK084(yu)006:442: de ltar dam pa'i rigs can lnga la gsang sngags kyi chos 'khor bskor ro //
NK084(yu)006:443: de'i tshe srin po blo gros thabs ldan gyis gsang
NK084(yu)006:444: sngags kyi rgyud rnams tshig dang yi ger bsdus pa'i
NK084(yu)006:445: byin rlabs mi yul du snang ba'o //
NK084(yu)006:446: gsum pa gang zag rna bar brgyud pa ni /
NK084(yu)006:447: de'i byin rlabs kyis za hor gyi yul a pa
NK084(yu)006:448: ra ta mu ta'i skal ldan rgyal po dza zhes
NK084(yu)006:449: bya ba de ri ma la ya'i shar ngos la
NK084(yu)006:450: tri sha a su ra zhes bya ba gnod sbyin
NK084(yu)006:451: gyi phug pa yod de sgo zla gam la ngo
NK084(yu)006:452: mtshar gyi ri mo rang byung ba /
NK084(yu)006:453: phug na rat+na zur brgyad la nyi zla'i ri mo rang snang ba /
NK084(yu)006:454: brag de'i spyi bor bya ka lan+ta ka zhes bya
NK084(yu)006:455: ba don gnyis par mi sgrog par byed pa'i tshang
NK084(yu)006:456: bcas pa der gang zag skal ldan gyi bgrod pa
NK084(yu)006:457: las / de ma yin gyi ma phyin pas gnas khyad par can de na bzhugs pa'i tshe na /
NK084(yu)006:458: dus der rmis ltas thun mong ma yin pa bdun shar te /
NK084(yu)006:459: dang po ri de'i rtse mor dpal phyag na rdo rje byon te /
NK084(yu)006:460: sku'i khyon las 'od sngon po 'phros pas 'jig rten thams cad bsregs nas mi snang bar byas /
NK084(yu)006:461: gsung gi sgra 'brug stong ldir ba lta bu thos /
NK084(yu)006:462: thugs las rdo rje 'bar ba zhig shar nas rgyal po'i thugs kar thim pa rmis /
NK084(yu)006:463: nyi ma 'od 'bar ba spyi bor thim /
NK084(yu)006:464: zla ba 'od 'bar ba zhig shar nas rkang mthil
NK084(yu)006:465: du thim nas snang srid thams cad lto ba nas
NK084(yu)006:468: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos kyi bgro ba
NK084(yu)006:469: mdzad cing nyi zla la chibs nas chos kyi 'khor
NK084(yu)006:470: lo bskor zhing / srid gsum kha lo gyen du bsgyur ba zhig rmis so //
NK084(yu)006:472: nam mkha'i 'od las gser gyi snying po can gyi kha dog ni 'thibs /
NK084(yu)006:473: cho 'phrul 'brug sgra go bar sla zhing snyan pa dang tshim pa ni grags /
NK084(yu)006:474: rat+na sna tshogs kyi rmugs pa ni 'thibs /
NK084(yu)006:476: snang srid gsal ba'i glog ni 'khyug /
NK084(yu)006:477: rat+na'i char mngon par 'bab pa zhig rmis so //
NK084(yu)006:479: lo ka'i bstan bcos kun gyi 'gyur /
NK084(yu)006:480: rat+na 'bar ba'i sgron me 'bar bas snang srid kyi mun pa ni bsal /
NK084(yu)006:481: bdud rtsi sman gyi chu rgyun byung bas 'gro ba thams cad kyi gcong snying ni sbyangs /
NK084(yu)006:482: 'gro ba thams cad kyang rdo rje rnal 'byor zhes sgra di ri ri sgrogs pa zhig rmis so //
NK084(yu)006:484: sprin gyi nang nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rat+na sna
NK084(yu)006:485: tshogs kyi 'od zer can zhig 'bar ba'i dkyil nas
NK084(yu)006:486: rat+na smug po dpal gyi be'u sgrom 'od dang bcas
NK084(yu)006:487: pa phyi nang thams cad gsal bar snang ba'i nang
NK084(yu)006:488: nas gser gyi glegs bam la bee d+aur+ya zhun mas
NK084(yu)006:489: rgya rang mnan du bris pa'i glegs bam mang po
NK084(yu)006:490: skar mda' thang la lhung ba bzhin 'bab pa zhig
NK084(yu)006:492: glegs bam de dag las byang chub sems dpa' mang po dang /
NK084(yu)006:493: rig 'dzin lha dang lha mo tshad med pa'i yon
NK084(yu)006:494: tan sgrog cing mchod bstod skor klog byed pa rmis
NK084(yu)006:496: nam mkha'i sprin gseb nas lung bstan pa'i sgra byung ste /
NK084(yu)006:497: las dang skal bar rab ldan zhing //
NK084(yu)006:498: rgyal bas 'byung bar lung bstan pa'i //
NK084(yu)006:499: bsod nams chen po dra ma khyod //
NK084(yu)006:500: sprul pa ci ltar lung bstan zhing //
NK084(yu)006:501: da lta'i dus 'dir mngon shar gyi //
NK084(yu)006:502: 'khor bar snying po bya ba'i phyir //
NK084(yu)006:503: nga yis cho 'phrul byin rlabs kyis //
NK084(yu)006:504: bstan pa'i snying po dam pa zhig /
NK084(yu)006:505: skal ldan khyod la bstan par bya //
NK084(yu)006:506: ma la ya zhes bya ba'i rtser //
NK084(yu)006:507: dgon pa chen po'i gnas shig tu //
NK084(yu)006:508: ye shes snying po can rnams kyi //
NK084(yu)006:509: gsang ba bya ba'i dam pa zhig /
NK084(yu)006:510: yod kyi gsang ba nan tan gyi //
NK084(yu)006:511: de la sems kyi me long gis //
NK084(yu)006:512: mngon du gsal bar rtogs ma thag /
NK084(yu)006:513: sangs rgyas sa la skal bar mnyam //
NK084(yu)006:514: bde ba can zhes bya ba ni //
NK084(yu)006:515: 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i //
NK084(yu)006:516: kun rig bde ba chen por 'gyur //
NK084(yu)006:517: rdo rje gsang chen gsang ba yi //
NK084(yu)006:518: dam pa'i mdzod gnyis gcig la ni //
NK084(yu)006:519: lha dang mi yi rig 'dzin la //
NK084(yu)006:520: rim pas brgyud de grags par 'gyur //
NK084(yu)006:522: de nas nang par sad de rab tu dgyes nas nyid kyi 'khor rnams bsdus nas /
NK084(yu)006:523: rmi lam byung ba'i lo rgyus gsungs ba /
NK084(yu)006:524: mdangs sum bdag la rmi lam 'di ltar byung //
NK084(yu)006:525: ri ma la ya gnam lcags yod rtse la //
NK084(yu)006:526: phyag na rdo rje'i pho brang gnas bzhugs te //
NK084(yu)006:527: sku las 'od 'phros snang srid byi dor byas //
NK084(yu)006:528: gsung gis sgra yis lo ka g.yo zhing 'gul //
NK084(yu)006:529: thugs las 'od byung bdag gi snying gar thim //
NK084(yu)006:530: nyi zla spyi bo rkang pa'i mthil du nub //
NK084(yu)006:531: bdag gi lto nas snang srid 'phyo ba rmis //
NK084(yu)006:532: dang po'i rmis ltas bag chags sbyang ba'i rtags //
NK084(yu)006:533: de nas bdag la sangs rgyas mang po rnams //
NK084(yu)006:534: rmad byung gsang ba'i don la bgro ba mdzad //
NK084(yu)006:535: nyi zla pad+ma seng ge'i khri steng na //
NK084(yu)006:536: chos kyi 'khor lo 'gro la bskor zhing rmis //
NK084(yu)006:537: gnyis pa yin te chos la dbang thob rtags //
NK084(yu)006:538: de nas mkha' la rat+na'i sprin gseb nas //
NK084(yu)006:539: snyan pa'i 'brug sgra gsal ba'i glog 'gyu ste //
NK084(yu)006:540: rat+na chos kyi char pa 'bab pa rmis //
NK084(yu)006:541: rmi lam gsum pa yin te dge ba'i ltas //
NK084(yu)006:542: 'gro la thugs rje'i chos kyi char 'bebs rtags //
NK084(yu)006:543: de nas lo ka rat+nasa gang byas te //
NK084(yu)006:544: nor bu 'od 'bar 'gro ba'i mun pa gsal //
NK084(yu)006:545: bdud rtsi sman gyi chu rgyun 'bab pa yis //
NK084(yu)006:546: 'gro ba'i nad rnying gtan nas sbyangs byas nas //
NK084(yu)006:547: 'gro kun rnal 'byor zhes ni grags par 'gyur //
NK084(yu)006:548: bzhi pa yin te 'di yang dge ba'i ltas //
NK084(yu)006:549: 'gro kun rnal 'byor gral du bzhag pa yin //
NK084(yu)006:550: drug pa rmi lam glegs bam de dag la //
NK084(yu)006:551: sangs rgyas byang chub rig 'dzin mang po'i tshogs //
NK084(yu)006:552: yon tan sgra sgrog mchod skor byed pa rmis //
NK084(yu)006:553: rmad byung che ba ston pa'i snga ltas yin //
NK084(yu)006:554: tha ma nam mkha'i dbyings rum sprin gseb nas //
NK084(yu)006:555: cho 'phrul rang sgra bdag lung bstan pa'i tshig /
NK084(yu)006:556: rim gyis gsang ba grags pa'i sgra sgrogs rmis //
NK084(yu)006:557: gsang ba dam pa rgya cher sgrog pa'i ltas //
NK084(yu)006:559: gong gi rmi lam gyi tshigs su bcad pa dag kyang brjod nas /
NK084(yu)006:560: rmi lam 'di dag dang sbyar na bdag nges par
NK084(yu)006:561: skal ba dang ldan par nges so zhes gsungs pa
NK084(yu)006:562: las / 'khor rnams kyis kyang de ltar legs so a la la zhes ngo mtshar du gsol te /
NK084(yu)006:564: de ltar yin phan chad pho brang gi rtse mor
NK084(yu)006:565: phyin la cho 'phrul gyi sa de la dmigs pa
NK084(yu)006:566: bcas te / mchod pa dang sgrub pa chen po
NK084(yu)006:567: zhig byas na dga' ba chen po zhig skye bar
NK084(yu)006:568: bcas te / nges pas / bdag yang thog tu gshegs so gsungs te byon pa las /
NK084(yu)006:569: rmi lam du ji ltar byon pa'i ngos zhig la /
NK084(yu)006:570: rat+na smug po las grub pa'i badz+ra p+aa ni'i sku
NK084(yu)006:571: khru gang ba zhig mthong nas rgyal po dgyes nas
NK084(yu)006:572: phyag dang bskor ba byas nas tshigs su brjod pa
NK084(yu)006:573: / sngon tshe gang nas bsgrub pa yi //
NK084(yu)006:574: las kyis mjal ba'i lha mchog ni //
NK084(yu)006:575: bskal par gzhar yang mi gtang ngo //
NK084(yu)006:576: 'dren pa mchog dpal la sogs grangs //
NK084(yu)006:577: mos pa'i gzungs kyi lha mchog 'dzin //
NK084(yu)006:578: zhes gsol nas thugs dam du byas te /
NK084(yu)006:579: rgyal po yi dgongs pas rtags 'di dag dang yang ldan na /
NK084(yu)006:580: ri bo 'di dpal phyag na rdo rje'i rang bzhin du nges pa dang /
NK084(yu)006:581: rig 'dzin grub pa thob pa'i gnas yin par gtam rnying pa thos pa dang /
NK084(yu)006:582: gcan gzan gdug pa can yang dge ba can la mngon du phyogs pa'i tshul dang sbyar na /
NK084(yu)006:583: 'grub par nges par 'grub snyam nas sgrub pa gzugs
NK084(yu)006:584: brnyan de la brten nas zla ba bdun pa'i rmi
NK084(yu)006:585: lam mthun pa'i glegs bam de dag la rab tu
NK084(yu)006:586: dga' ba'i tshul gyis gsung gi sgrar bklags nas tshig
NK084(yu)006:587: gcig kyang brda ma 'jal nas the tshom du gyur
NK084(yu)006:588: nas / e ma hoh sngags kyi tshul rtags sbyar
NK084(yu)006:589: na glegs bam 'di dag las ngo mtshar du gyur
NK084(yu)006:590: pa'i don chen po zhig yod par nges te /
NK084(yu)006:591: bdag gis mi rtogs pa ci nyes snyam du bshum mo //
NK084(yu)006:592: de nas cung zad cig nas the tshom gyi rtog pa de dag zhi nas /
NK084(yu)006:593: lo ka 'di dag brda' 'jal ba su yod ces bsgrags nas /
NK084(yu)006:594: za hor rgyal po u pa r+aa dza zhes bya
NK084(yu)006:595: ba mkhyen pa che bar yod do zhes zer nas
NK084(yu)006:596: / pho nya ba bardzangasa lo rgyus zhib tu gsol nas spyan drangs bas ma gnang ste /
NK084(yu)006:597: gal te bdag gis ma shes na der phyin pa'i
NK084(yu)006:598: tshul ma yin gyi bsams nas 'dir skyol zhes smras
NK084(yu)006:599: so // der rgyal por bsnyad pas glang po che
NK084(yu)006:600: la bkal te gdan drangs pas tshig gcig kyang brda
NK084(yu)006:601: so // ma 'jal te / bdag gi spyod yul
NK084(yu)006:602: du ma gyur pas rgyal po nyid kyi thugs kyis
NK084(yu)006:603: rjes dpag 'tshal slar phar bardzangasa so //
NK084(yu)006:604: de nas 'di khyi'i rgyal po la ga thung dang /
NK084(yu)006:605: yum skra'i lwa ba can gyi bu dge slong ku
NK084(yu)006:606: ku r+aa dza zhes bya ba tshe lo stong thub
NK084(yu)006:607: byang chub sems dpa' rin chen mang gi sprul pa
NK084(yu)006:609: rdo rje sems dpa' zhal mthong gi le'u rtogs te bsgrubs pas /
NK084(yu)006:610: zhal mthong ste lung bstan pa /
NK084(yu)006:611: gsang bdag dang mjal nas gsungs /
NK084(yu)006:612: des rgyal po la bshad zer ba yod de /
NK084(yu)006:613: 'grel sgrub nas gsal bas 'dir ma bshad do //
NK084(yu)006:614: 'dir rgyal po nyid kyi thun mong ma yin par rig ste /
NK084(yu)006:615: sngar sangs rgyas kyi chos thos pa las byung ba
NK084(yu)006:616: bzhin du sgrib pa sbyang ba dang tshogs bsags pa
NK084(yu)006:617: rgya chen po byas nas brtags pas /
NK084(yu)006:618: sgyu 'phrul dra ba rdo rje sems dpa' zhal mthong gi le'u brda 'jal bar gyur te /
NK084(yu)006:619: de bzhin bsgrubs pas rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal gzigs te /
NK084(yu)006:620: glegs bam thams cad rtogs par gsol ba btab pas /
NK084(yu)006:621: rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pas /
NK084(yu)006:622: rigs kyi bu de ltar na rang gi phung po sbyongs shig /
NK084(yu)006:623: khyod kyi ston pa ni gsang ba'i bdag po yin gyi /
NK084(yu)006:624: de'i don ma lus pa ston par 'gyur ro //
NK084(yu)006:625: de nas dga' ba chen po skyes te /
NK084(yu)006:626: de bzhin du bskyed rim gyi phung po sbyangs pas /
NK084(yu)006:627: sa dag kyang cher g.yos te /
NK084(yu)006:628: badz+ra p+aa ni'i zhal mngon sum du gzigs nas de nyid kyi tshe badz+ra p+aa ni'i brtul zhugs mdzad /
NK084(yu)006:629: rdo rje nam mkha' la sbar nas /
NK084(yu)006:630: h'u h'u rdo rje 'dul ba la sogs pa'i tshig
NK084(yu)006:631: dang sngags brjod pas lo ka'i dregs pa can thams
NK084(yu)006:632: cad rdo khab len gyis lcags bsdus pa'i tshul du
NK084(yu)006:633: 'khor du bsdus / rdo rje gsang ba'i ming so sor btags nas lung gsang sgor phye ste /
NK084(yu)006:634: dam pa'i mdzod sum brgya cher bshad pa ni /
NK084(yu)006:635: rgyud yan lag bco brgyad la sogs par gsungs te /
NK084(yu)006:636: de ltar phyag na rdo rjes rgyal po dza la gsungs /
NK084(yu)006:637: des ku ku r+aa dza tshom bu 'bum sde la gsungs /
NK084(yu)006:638: des rgyal po in+d+ra bo d+hi chen po 'khor tshom bu khri dang bcas pa la gsungs /
NK084(yu)006:639: des sing+ha r+aa dza tshom bu stong la /
NK084(yu)006:640: des u pa r+aa dza tshom bu lnga brgya la /
NK084(yu)006:641: des in+d+ra bo d+hi'i sras mo go ma 'khor tshom bu brgya dang bcas pa la gsungs te /
NK084(yu)006:642: des thams cad tshom bu'i tshogs bsgrubs pas rig 'dzin thob par gyur to //
NK084(yu)006:643: de ltar sangs rgyas gsang ba'i lam rim du gsungs pa /
NK084(yu)006:644: gsang ba'i bdag po mngon gshegs nas //
NK084(yu)006:645: lha klu gnod sbyin srin po dang //
NK084(yu)006:646: mi las skal ldan 'dus pa las //
NK084(yu)006:647: dbang pos ji ltar lung bstan dus //
NK084(yu)006:648: rgyal bu rigs can ltas shar ba //
NK084(yu)006:649: 'brel pas snang ba mngon brtags pas //
NK084(yu)006:650: thugs kyi sgrub pa mngon rtogs te //
NK084(yu)006:651: de nyid bsgoms nas de nyid 'grub //
NK084(yu)006:652: bstan pa'i dngos grub de nas thob //
NK084(yu)006:653: don dam bcud kyis de nas rgyal //
NK084(yu)006:655: smon pa'i lha dang de ru mjal //
NK084(yu)006:656: de nas rdo rje gdan steng gi //
NK084(yu)006:657: 'dzam gling shar gyi phyogs mtshams su //
NK084(yu)006:658: pho brang rin chen dam pa der //
NK084(yu)006:659: bkra shis pa yi khang pa ru //
NK084(yu)006:660: ku ku r+aa dza in+d+ra bo d+hi dang //
NK084(yu)006:661: sing+ha u pa r+aa dza dang //
NK084(yu)006:662: sras mo go ma sa la sogs //
NK084(yu)006:663: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dbang thob nas //
NK084(yu)006:664: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mngon bsgrubs nas //
NK084(yu)006:665: rdo rje 'chang bar mngon du gshegs //
NK084(yu)006:666: zhes rig 'dzin brgyud pa kho na'o //
NK084(yu)006:667: de yang tan+t+ra sde bco brgyad du phye ba ni //
NK084(yu)006:673: spyi rgyud gsum ste bco brgyad do //
NK084(yu)006:674: de la sku'i sku rgyud glang po rab 'bog /
NK084(yu)006:675: sku'i gsung rgyud glang po chur 'jug /
NK084(yu)006:676: sku'i thugs rgyud sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor /
NK084(yu)006:677: gsung gi sku rgyud ri bo brtsegs pa /
NK084(yu)006:678: gsung gi gsung rgyud pad+ma dbang chen /
NK084(yu)006:679: gsung gi thugs rgyud zla gsang thig le'o //
NK084(yu)006:680: thugs kyi sku rgyud rtse mo 'dus pa /
NK084(yu)006:681: thugs kyi gsung rgyud gcig las 'phros pa /
NK084(yu)006:682: thugs kyi thugs rgyud gsang ba 'dus pa /
NK084(yu)006:683: yon tan gyi sku rgyud sgron me 'bar ba /
NK084(yu)006:684: yon tan gyi gsung rgyud bdud rtsi sa ma ya 'bum ste /
NK084(yu)006:685: yon tan gyi thugs rgyud dpal mchog dang po /
NK084(yu)006:686: phrin las kyi sku rgyud dpal phreng dkar mo /
NK084(yu)006:687: phrin las kyi gsung rgyud ma mo rgyud lung /
NK084(yu)006:688: phrin las kyi thugs rgyud ta ma la 'bum ste /
NK084(yu)006:690: spyi gsung rgyud sa ma ya bkod pa /
NK084(yu)006:691: spyi'i thugs rgyud gsang ba sgyu 'phrul lo //
NK084(yu)006:692: de ltar phye nas rgyal po dza la bshad do //
NK084(yu)006:693: thos chung log smra'i blo mig can gyi rigs kha cig na re /
NK084(yu)006:694: sngags rnying ma'i rgyud la la yang dag pa ma yin /
NK084(yu)006:695: rgya gar na mi 'dug zer ba sogs ni /
NK084(yu)006:696: rang gi blo gros kyi mig long ba yin te /
NK084(yu)006:697: rgya gar thang bi ha ra'i gtsug lag khang na
NK084(yu)006:698: rnying ma'i chos skor rgyud kyi rgya dpe bzhugs pas
NK084(yu)006:699: mtshan yi ger bkod na bka' rgyas pa tsam bzhugs
NK084(yu)006:700: par grags / de skad du dkon mchog brtsegs pa las /
NK084(yu)006:701: 'od srungs nga dang nga 'dra ba'i gang zag gis
NK084(yu)006:702: tshod gzung du rung gi gzhan dag ni las yin
NK084(yu)006:703: te log par ltung ba'i phyir ro //
NK084(yu)006:706: mi rig pa yi gzugs la mi rigs na //
NK084(yu)006:707: the tshom za ba'i chos la smos ci dgos //
NK084(yu)006:708: de bas btang snyoms bzhag na nyes pa med //
NK084(yu)006:711: ma mthong phyir na med pa min //
NK084(yu)006:713: chos kyang yang dag pa ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs te /
NK084(yu)006:714: sprul sku de la sngon 'byung gi da lta med
NK084(yu)006:715: do zhes kyang mi bsam ste rtag tu mos pa'i
NK084(yu)006:716: nges 'byung la / des mdo dang rgyud sngar ma
NK084(yu)006:717: grags pa gsal bar mdzad pa'ang srid pas skur pa
NK084(yu)006:718: nges 'byung la / mi gdab pa / chos gang
NK084(yu)006:719: la thar pa'i lam du 'jug cing 'khor ba spang
NK084(yu)006:720: bar ston pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab
NK084(yu)006:723: khams gsum dag na nyon mongs spang byed gsung //
NK084(yu)006:724: zhi ba'i yon tan brjod par mdzad pa gang //
NK084(yu)006:725: de ni drang srong gsung yin ldog pa gzhan //
NK084(yu)006:727: sangs rgyas ni rtag par bzhugs pas gdul bya'i don mdzad la /
NK084(yu)006:728: byin rlabs kyi bka' yang ri dang shing dang pad+ma dang dpag bsam gyi shing dang /
NK084(yu)006:733: ri dgas la sogs chos kyi rnam grangs kyi sgra byung ba de yang bka' gsungs pa yod na /
NK084(yu)006:734: sngar byung gi da lta mi srid ces log par mi lta ste /
NK084(yu)006:735: byin gyis brlabs pa dag 'byung srid pa'i phyir ro //
NK084(yu)006:736: des na gang la yid ches pa dam par bzung nas yi dam du byas pa 'thad kyi /
NK084(yu)006:737: gzhan la skur pa nam yang gdab par mi bya'o //
NK084(yu)006:738: gsang sngags rnying ma'i nang na rdzogs pa chen po'i
NK084(yu)006:739: chos 'ga' zhig las lha gnas gsum dang 'og min
NK084(yu)006:740: du gsungs pa rnams gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na
NK084(yu)006:741: rdo rje dang / rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs
NK084(yu)006:742: pas tshig tu btus te gser gyi glegs bam la
NK084(yu)006:743: bee d+aur+ya zhun mas bris te /
NK084(yu)006:744: rgya rang mnan du byas te dgongs pa'i rtsal bdun gyi nam mkha' la sbas pa la /
NK084(yu)006:745: de ltar gsungs pa'i rgyud sde rnams mi'i yul du ji ltar babs pa ni /
NK084(yu)006:746: rgyud la la rgyal po in+d+ra bo d+hi chen po'i don du byung /
NK084(yu)006:747: rgyud la la rgyal po dza'i khang thog tu glegs bam gyi char pa babs /
NK084(yu)006:748: rgyud la la mi'i yul nas byung /
NK084(yu)006:749: rgyud la la gnod sbyin dang srin po dang gshin rje'i yul nas brgyud de byung /
NK084(yu)006:750: rgyud la la sbyang ba'i don ldan rnams kyi don ri ma la ya'i rtse nas byung /
NK084(yu)006:751: rgyud la la 'og min gyi gnas nas rgya mtsho'i gling du brgyud de byung /
NK084(yu)006:752: rgyud la la mkha' 'gro ma'i gnas nas brgyud de byung ba'o //
NK084(yu)006:753: 'o na ji ltar na sngon bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling na bzhugs pa'i dus su /
NK084(yu)006:754: sprul pa'i nyan thos rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa dag gling 'di nas gzhan du gshegs pa /
NK084(yu)006:755: nam mkha' la lam byung nas 'gro ba rgyal pos gzigs te /
NK084(yu)006:756: 'khor rnams la ci yin dris pas /
NK084(yu)006:757: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor sprul pa'i nyan
NK084(yu)006:758: thos dag gling gzhan du gshegs pa yin no zhes
NK084(yu)006:759: gsol pas / nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'di lta bu gang gi mthu yin zhes pas /
NK084(yu)006:760: sangs rgyas kyi mthu yin zhes gsol pas /
NK084(yu)006:761: rgyal po'i zhal nas de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang /
NK084(yu)006:762: sangs rgyas ni su zhig yin gsungs pas /
NK084(yu)006:763: de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sh+aakya
NK084(yu)006:764: thub pa zhes bya ba da lta bya rgod phung
NK084(yu)006:765: po'i ri la sogs pa'i gnas na 'khor dgra bcom
NK084(yu)006:766: pa dang bcas nas bzhugs so zhes gsol pas /
NK084(yu)006:768: de lta bu'i skyes bu de bdag gi khab tu spyan drongs shig gsungs pas /
NK084(yu)006:769: bcom ldan 'das 'khor dgra bcom pa dang bcas pa spyan drangs te gdugs tshod sbyar te /
NK084(yu)006:771: bde bar gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la
NK084(yu)006:772: sogs che ba'i yon tan 'di dag gang las byung
NK084(yu)006:773: zhes gsol pas / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
NK084(yu)006:774: dge ba'i tshogs rnam par dka' ba bsags pa las byung zhes so //
NK084(yu)006:776: bdag kyang de bzhin du spyad par bgyi gnang zhes gsol pas /
NK084(yu)006:779: sras dang btsun mo spangs la rab tu byung ste
NK084(yu)006:780: pha rol du phyin pa drug sgrubs shig ces bka'
NK084(yu)006:781: stsal pas / rgyal pos gsol pa /
NK084(yu)006:782: de ltar mi nus te btsun mo dang bcas par
NK084(yu)006:783: byang chub thob pa'i chos shig zhu 'tshal zhes gsol
NK084(yu)006:784: pa dang / skad cig de nyid la rigs drug pa'i dkyil 'khor snang bar mdzad /
NK084(yu)006:786: dpal phyag na rdo rje la bka' bsgos te /
NK084(yu)006:787: sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi dgongs pa mdzad /
NK084(yu)006:788: dus la babs pas shod cig ces pas sangs rgyas
NK084(yu)006:789: thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba'i rgyud rtogs pa bcu
NK084(yu)006:790: slob bu'i don du bshad do //
NK084(yu)006:791: de nas rgyal pos rgyud lnga sde'i don thugs su chud de bsgrubs pas /
NK084(yu)006:792: 'khor 'bum tsho dang bcas pa rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa thob /
NK084(yu)006:793: gdams ngag khyi'i mkhan po la bzhag go //
NK084(yu)006:796: skad cig de nyid la ston pa rdo rje 'chang
NK084(yu)006:797: gi cha lugs su mdzad de 'og min du gshegs
NK084(yu)006:798: nas gsang 'dus gsungs zhes zer ro //
NK084(yu)006:800: in+d+ra bo d+hi zhes pa dang po'i mgon po ste /
NK084(yu)006:801: o rgyan yul gyi rgyal po min par bshad pa dang /
NK084(yu)006:802: yang rnam pa cig tu na /
NK084(yu)006:803: in+d+ra bo d+hi chen po'i sras rgyal po dza zhes bya ba'i sku ring la /
NK084(yu)006:804: za hor gyi yul na drag shul can gyi ri ma la ya zhes bya ba yod de /
NK084(yu)006:805: ri de yang rtse mo na ri dwags kyi rgyal po seng ge'i 'khrab pa yod pa /
NK084(yu)006:806: 'dabs la gcan gzan stag gi tshang yod pa /
NK084(yu)006:807: logs la brag dkar po seng ge gnam du mchong
NK084(yu)006:808: ba 'dra ba yod pa de la shing sna tshogs
NK084(yu)006:810: de'i shar phyogs na kri sha a nu ta ra
NK084(yu)006:811: zhes bya ba'i brag phug yod pas sgo la ngo
NK084(yu)006:812: mtshar can gyi ri mo rang byung du yod pa
NK084(yu)006:813: / bu dkar rin po che zur brgyad nyi zla'i
NK084(yu)006:814: rol mo rang snang ba spyi bo na bya ka
NK084(yu)006:815: lan ta ka'i tshang byas pa /
NK084(yu)006:816: rtsa bar bdud rtsi'i chu mig yod pa /
NK084(yu)006:817: mdun na me tog sna tshogs pa'i tshal yod pa /
NK084(yu)006:818: shing gi yal ga phyogs bzhir gyes pa /
NK084(yu)006:819: dus bzhi'i gnod pa las skyob pa /
NK084(yu)006:820: shing de'i 'bru sman du gyur te /
NK084(yu)006:821: zos pas nad sna tshogs sel ba /
NK084(yu)006:822: ri de'i rked pa na mkhar yang thog gsum yod pa'i bar khang na /
NK084(yu)006:823: skal ldan gyi rgyal po dza nyid du bzhugs te /
NK084(yu)006:824: de yang sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas lo nyi shu rtsa brgyad lon pa'i tshe /
NK084(yu)006:825: cho 'phrul chen po'i zla ba'i rgyal gyi nyi ma
NK084(yu)006:826: la ngo mtshar can gyi ltas sna tshogs byung nas
NK084(yu)006:827: / rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas mchod pa rgya chen po bshams nas /
NK084(yu)006:828: des nub mo pho brang grong khyer dang bcas pa /
NK084(yu)006:829: ri bo me ri 'bar ba'i rtse mo dang bcas 'od kyis gang bar byas so //
NK084(yu)006:830: de'i rjes su bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs rjes /
NK084(yu)006:831: bstan pa gsang sngags kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i dus la bab ste /
NK084(yu)006:832: dpal gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje mngon par gshegs te /
NK084(yu)006:833: 'khor dam pa'i rigs can lnga'i rigs grags ldan mchog skyong /
NK084(yu)006:836: srin po blo gros thabs ldan /
NK084(yu)006:837: mi las skal ldan li tsa b+ai dri ma med pa dang lnga 'dus pa las /
NK084(yu)006:838: rdo rje theg pa'i chos 'khor bskor zhing /
NK084(yu)006:839: srin po blo gros thabs ldan gyis yi ger bsdus pa'i byin rlabs gnang ngo //
NK084(yu)006:840: de'i dus su rgyal po dza la rmis ltas bdun shar tshul gong du smos pa ltar la /
NK084(yu)006:841: de nas yab rgyal po lag thung dang yum skra'i
NK084(yu)006:842: lwa ba can gyi bu dge slong ku ku r+aa
NK084(yu)006:843: dza bya ba mkhyen pa che zhing /
NK084(yu)006:844: rgyal po in+d+ra bo d+hi'i slob ma yin par dgongs te snyam nas /
NK084(yu)006:845: glang po che'i khal du byas te slob dpon ku
NK084(yu)006:846: ku ra dza la bskyal te don 'grol bar zhus
NK084(yu)006:847: pas / slob dpon des kyang dang po ma mkhyen te 'di skad smras so //
NK084(yu)006:848: 'phags pa ni thugs rje re chung /
NK084(yu)006:850: tan+t+ra ni tshig gcig tsam yang ma rtogs zhes yan lag sa la brdabs pas /
NK084(yu)006:851: de'i nub mo rmi lam du dpal rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi zhal bstan nas /
NK084(yu)006:852: rigs kyi bu sems ma zhi bar spro ba bskyed
NK084(yu)006:853: la gang rtogs pa de'i gzhung ltar sgrubs shig gsungs
NK084(yu)006:854: so // de nas nam langs nas glegs bam la gzigs pas /
NK084(yu)006:855: dpal gsang ba snying po'i gzhung las /
NK084(yu)006:856: rdo rje sems dpa' zhal mthong gi le'u thugs su chud de /
NK084(yu)006:858: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i zhal mthong ste /
NK084(yu)006:859: rigs kyi bu dngos grub ci 'dod gsungs pa la /
NK084(yu)006:860: dngos grub rnam pa gsum 'tshal te /
NK084(yu)006:861: de la glegs bam 'di rnams kyi don shes pa /
NK084(yu)006:862: 'gro ba mtha' dag gi don 'grub pa /
NK084(yu)006:863: mthar bla na med pa'i byang chub 'grub pa zhig 'tshal lo zhes zhus pas /
NK084(yu)006:864: de bzhin du gyur cig gsungs nas mi snang bar gyur te /
NK084(yu)006:865: der slob dpon chen po ku ku r+aa dzas glegs bam de dag gzigs pas /
NK084(yu)006:866: tshig don thams cad thugs su chud de tan+t+ra sde bco brgyad du phye ba yin no skad /
NK084(yu)006:867: 'chad lugs gcig la gong lta bu'o //
NK084(yu)006:868: bab tshul 'di dag 'gyur phyi ma dang khung mthun par 'byung ste /
NK084(yu)006:869: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i rgyud phyi ma las /
NK084(yu)006:870: bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das khar 'jam dpal gyis zhus pa /
NK084(yu)006:871: bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'di kho nar 'dug gam zhes gsol pas /
NK084(yu)006:874: lo ni brgya dang bcu gnyis la //
NK084(yu)006:875: bstan pa'i snying po dam pa zhig /
NK084(yu)006:876: mi las skal ldan mchog gyur pa //
NK084(yu)006:877: rgyal po dza zhes bya ba la //
NK084(yu)006:878: thugs rje ldan pa'i byin rlabs kyis //
NK084(yu)006:879: lag na rdo rjes ston par 'gyur //
NK084(yu)006:881: gsang ba'i snying po'i rgyud phyi ma las /
NK084(yu)006:882: re zhig snod dang ldan pa'i mi //
NK084(yu)006:883: de ming rgyal po dza zhes bya //
NK084(yu)006:884: lag na rdo rje'i mthus snang 'gyur //
NK084(yu)006:887: mi yi gnas kyi 'jig rten khams //
NK084(yu)006:888: gling bzhi pa la 'dzam gling gi //
NK084(yu)006:889: drag shul can zhes bya ba'i ri //
NK084(yu)006:890: gnod sbyin 'dul ba'i gnas yin te //
NK084(yu)006:891: chos 'dzin rigs kyi sgrub gnas yin //
NK084(yu)006:892: zhes mdo rgyud du ma nas gsungs te /
NK084(yu)006:893: rgyu la la mi'i gnas nas byung ba ni /
NK084(yu)006:894: t+aa tha sam gra ha'i rgyud de /
NK084(yu)006:896: mi yi yul du babs nas su //
NK084(yu)006:897: sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir //
NK084(yu)006:898: rdo rje theg pa mchog skor zhig /
NK084(yu)006:899: mgon po rab tu gshegs par mdzod //
NK084(yu)006:900: ces pas ri rab kyi rtse mo de nyid nas
NK084(yu)006:901: sprul pa dpag tu med pa 'dzam bu'i gling yul
NK084(yu)006:902: nyi shu rtsa bzhir bkye ste /
NK084(yu)006:903: lho phyogs gyad kyi yul nags tshal dra ba can gyi mdo /
NK084(yu)006:904: skyes bu 'byung ba'i gnas zhes bya ba der 'phags pa 'jam dpal du sprul nas /
NK084(yu)006:905: 'jam dpal gyi le'u khri drug stong dang /
NK084(yu)006:906: bshad rgyud cho ga 'dus pa le'u nyis stong bdun brgya pa dang /
NK084(yu)006:907: dka' ba yongs su spyod pa'i rgyud sh+lo ka sum brgya drug cu la sogs pa bshad do //
NK084(yu)006:908: bsil ba'i tshal du ston pa rigs gsum mgon pos kri ya thams cad bshad do //
NK084(yu)006:909: nub phyogs o rgyan gyi yul du mchod rten dpal 'bras kyi nang /
NK084(yu)006:910: gan+d+ho la'i dri gtsang khang reg pa med pa'i gdugs can gyi nang du /
NK084(yu)006:911: ston pa rdo rje 'chang chen he badz+ra du sprul nas /
NK084(yu)006:912: dgyes pa rdo rje 'bum tsho lnga'i bdag nyid bshad
NK084(yu)006:913: rgyud bzhi dang bcas pa bshad pa de 'dzam bu'i
NK084(yu)006:914: gling khyad par can gyi yul nyi shu rtsa bzhir
NK084(yu)006:915: / ston pa rdo rje 'chang chen pos bde mchog 'khor lo'i bshad rgyud dang bcas pa bshad do //
NK084(yu)006:916: ri ma la ya gnam lcags yod pa'i rtse la
NK084(yu)006:917: 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed du sprul nas gshin rje
NK084(yu)006:918: gshed kyi rgyud kha cig gsungs so //
NK084(yu)006:919: dur khrod brgyad kyi gnas su ston pa he rus /
NK084(yu)006:922: ma h+aa m+aa y+aa la sogs pa bshad do //
NK084(yu)006:923: smre khrod kyi grong khyer du gsang sngags nang gi rgyud mang po gsungs so //
NK084(yu)006:924: ri bya rkang can du yang gsungs /
NK084(yu)006:925: de ltar du mi yul du gsungs pa zhes de
NK084(yu)006:926: rnams kyang kha cig ni mkha' 'gro ma dang lha
NK084(yu)006:927: klu rnams kyis spyan drangs te phyis grub pa thob
NK084(yu)006:928: pa rnams kyis de dag gi yul nas spyan drangs
NK084(yu)006:929: / kha cig ni dus de nyid nas mi yul du brgyud do //
NK084(yu)006:932: gshin rje'i gnas nas 'byung ba ni /
NK084(yu)006:934: dpal rdo rje gur gyi rgyud la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon gsang ba pas /
NK084(yu)006:935: slob dpon mthu stobs r+aa dza la phyis bshad do //
NK084(yu)006:936: srin po'i yul nas byung ba ni dpal 'byung ba dang dpal dam pa'i rgyud /
NK084(yu)006:937: de'i yan lag dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa'
NK084(yu)006:938: blo gros rgya mtshos grong khyer dga' ba can du
NK084(yu)006:939: slob dpon in+d+ra bo d+hi bar ma la bshad do
NK084(yu)006:940: // gshin rje'i yul nas byung ba ni dgra nag gi rgyud kha cig dang /
NK084(yu)006:941: kha thun zla gsang la sogs pa gshin rje'i rgyud
NK084(yu)006:942: mang po slob dpon la li ta badz+ra gyis spyan
NK084(yu)006:943: drangs te slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen la bshad
NK084(yu)006:944: / ri ma la ya'i rtser lag na rdo rjes /
NK084(yu)006:945: yang lung a nu yo ga'i mdo rnams dam pa'i
NK084(yu)006:946: rigs can lnga la gsungs pa ni tan+t+ra sde bco
NK084(yu)006:947: brgyad dus mtshungs zhes pa'ang snang ngo //
NK084(yu)006:948: de yang kri ya rnams w+aa ra n+aa sir babs /
NK084(yu)006:949: yo ga rnams me ri 'bar bar babs /
NK084(yu)006:950: ma h+aa yo ga rnams rgyal po dza'i khang thog tu babs /
NK084(yu)006:951: a nu yo ga rnams ri ma la gnam lcags yod pa'i rtse la babs /
NK084(yu)006:952: a ti yo ga rnams o rgyan d+ha na ko sha'i gling du babs /
NK084(yu)006:953: rgyud sde gzhan rnams ni dngos su pu ti babs pa yin /
NK084(yu)006:954: a ti yo ga ni de ltar ma yin te /
NK084(yu)006:955: rdo rje sems dpa'i slob ma lha'i bu kun dga' snying po zhes bya ba /
NK084(yu)006:956: rgyal po u pa r+aa dza dang /
NK084(yu)006:957: snang gsal 'od ldan gnyis kyi sras mo su d+harma'i sras su 'khrungs shing /
NK084(yu)006:958: 'og min du dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po'i dbang dang /
NK084(yu)006:959: yang gsang bla na med pa'i gdams pa dang bcas
NK084(yu)006:960: pa yongs su rdzogs par zhus te gnas pa las
NK084(yu)006:961: / de nas sngar gyi sangs rgyas kyi gsungs pa'i sde snod dang /
NK084(yu)006:962: khyad par du rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po'i rgyud
NK084(yu)006:963: 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi thugs la bzhugs pa
NK084(yu)006:964: rnams ri ma la ya rin po che rnam par
NK084(yu)006:965: sprul pa'i rtse mor rdo rje dbyings kyi mkha' 'gro
NK084(yu)006:966: ma bde ba'i ro ldan ma dang /
NK084(yu)006:967: bde byed ser mo yon tan mtha' yas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma gnyis kyis zhus te /
NK084(yu)006:968: lo gsum du yi ger bkod nas mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'du ba'i phug tu bzhugs so //
NK084(yu)006:969: de yang rnying ma la'ang bya rgyud spyod rgyud /
NK084(yu)006:972: phyi ma la rnal 'byor tsam dang /
NK084(yu)006:973: rnal 'byor bla med de nang tshan du phye na rgyud sde bzhi'o //
NK084(yu)006:975: lta spyod 'dus pa nam mkha' che'i rgyud /
NK084(yu)006:976: che mchog rol pa rtsa ba'i rgyud /
NK084(yu)006:977: khrag 'thung rol pa rtsa ba'i rgyud /
NK084(yu)006:978: gshin rje rol pa rtsa ba'i rgyud /
NK084(yu)006:979: rta mchog rol pa rtsa ba'i rgyud /
NK084(yu)006:980: phur pa rol pa rtsa ba'i rgyud /
NK084(yu)006:981: ma mo rol pa rtsa ba'i rgyud /
NK084(yu)006:982: rig 'dzin rol pa rtsa ba'i rgyud /
NK084(yu)006:983: drag sngags rol pa rtsa ba'i rgyud rnams gsungs so //
NK084(yu)006:984: de yang rtsa rgyud phyi ma'i rgyud /
NK084(yu)006:986: ma tshang ba kha skong ba'i rgyud /
NK084(yu)006:987: 'byed par byed pa lde mig gi rgyud dang lnga'o //
NK084(yu)006:988: de yang ston pa ni kun tu bzang po ste rgyud 'chad pa'o //
NK084(yu)006:989: chos ni gang du smos pa'i rgyud sde rnams so //
NK084(yu)006:990: sdud pa po ni rig 'dzin rdo rje chos te /
NK084(yu)006:991: mi'i thod pa can rdo rje drag po rtsal zhes bya bas bsdus nas yi ger bkod pa'o //
NK084(yu)006:992: don tshan ni kri ya nas a ti'i bar te drug go //
NK084(yu)006:993: de nas rgyud rnams mkha' 'gro dang sde brgyad la
NK084(yu)006:994: gtad nas sbed par brtsam pa'i tshe so so'i gnas
NK084(yu)006:996: blo ma mthun pa las mkha' 'gro ma las kyi dbang mo ches /
NK084(yu)006:997: dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal gyi mchod rten bde byed brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i nang du sbas so //
NK084(yu)006:998: de nas dus phyis slob dpon brgyad kyis 'don par
NK084(yu)006:999: 'dod de der tshogs nas mkha' 'gro ma la gtor
NK084(yu)006:1000: ma phul gsol ba btab pa'i tshe mkha' 'gro ma
NK084(yu)006:1003: sku ni lhar gsal gsung ni sngags su sgrogs //
NK084(yu)006:1004: thugs ni mnyam nyid rdo rje lta bu'o //
NK084(yu)006:1005: sprul pa sna tshogs 'phro ba'i slob dpon brgyad //
NK084(yu)006:1006: bka' ni ci stsal gsung ni gang gsungs nyan //
NK084(yu)006:1008: e ma ho 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs ma mo d+aa ki dang //
NK084(yu)006:1009: bdud dang gshin rje la sogs bdag la nyon //
NK084(yu)006:1010: bka' bzhin byed pa khyed rnams mchod byed pa //
NK084(yu)006:1011: sgrom bu dgu po de rnams khur la shog /
NK084(yu)006:1013: slob dpon h'u ka ra la he ru ka gal
NK084(yu)006:1014: po la sogs pa yang dag thugs kyi rgyud rnams
NK084(yu)006:1015: gtad / 'jam dpal bshes gnyen la 'jam dpal gsang rgyud la sogs gshin rje'i rgyud rnams gtad /
NK084(yu)006:1016: klu sgrub la rta mchog rol pa la sogs pad+ma gsung gi rgyud rnams gtad /
NK084(yu)006:1017: slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas la bi to ta ma
NK084(yu)006:1018: la sogs phur pa phrin las kyi rgyud rnams gtad
NK084(yu)006:1019: / bi ma mi tra la bdud rtsi rol pa'i
NK084(yu)006:1020: rgyud sogs bdud rtsi yon tan gyi rgyud rnams gtad
NK084(yu)006:1021: / / d+h+aa na sam skri ta la rgyud lung 'bum tig la sogs ma mo'i rgyud rnams gtad /
NK084(yu)006:1022: rom+bu gu h+ya d+ae wa tsan+d+ra la sku'i rgyud dregs
NK084(yu)006:1023: pa 'dus pa sogs 'jig rten dregs pa can gyi
NK084(yu)006:1024: rgyud rnams gtad / phung byed sh+ain+tam gar+b+ha la drag
NK084(yu)006:1025: sngags shel phreng dkar po'i rgyud sogs dmod pa drag
NK084(yu)006:1027: bde gshegs 'dus pa'i rgyud rnams slob dpon thun mong du gtad nas /
NK084(yu)006:1028: slar yang mchod rten du bcug go //
NK084(yu)006:1029: so sor gtad pa'i rgyud rnams yongs su rgyas par bya'o //
NK084(yu)006:1030: de nas slob dpon chen po pad+mas slar mchod rten
NK084(yu)006:1031: de nyid nas bde gshegs 'dus pa bton nas yang
NK084(yu)006:1032: le shod kyi brag phug tu bder 'dus kyi dkyil
NK084(yu)006:1033: 'khor zhal phyes nas bsgrubs pas phyag rgya chen po
NK084(yu)006:1034: mchog 'grub / rig 'dzin brgyad la bder 'dus kyi
NK084(yu)006:1035: dbang bskur nas rig 'dzin brgyad kyi bla ma yang
NK084(yu)006:1036: mchog 'grub / mdzad / de nas slob dpon pad+ma bod du spyan drangs /
NK084(yu)006:1037: bsam yas su phebs nas rgyal po khri srong lde'u
NK084(yu)006:1038: btsan rje blon 'bangs bcas brgyad la bde gshegs 'dus
NK084(yu)006:1039: pa'i dbang bskur / rigs kyi me tog dor ba na /
NK084(yu)006:1040: rgyal po'i me tog dbus su che mchog la bab /
NK084(yu)006:1041: gnubs nam mkha'i snying po'i me tog shar yang dag la bab /
NK084(yu)006:1042: gnubs sangs rgyas ye shes rig 'dzin lho gshin rje la bab /
NK084(yu)006:1043: ngan lam rgyal ba mchog dbyangs nub dbang chen la /
NK084(yu)006:1044: jo mo mtsho rgyal gyi me tog byang rdo rje gzhon nu /
NK084(yu)006:1045: 'brog ban dpal gyi ye shes kyi me tog shar lho ma mo la /
NK084(yu)006:1046: rlangs dpal gyi me tog nub byang dregs pa kun 'dul la bab /
NK084(yu)006:1047: pa gor bee ro tsa na'i me tog byang shar dmod pa drag sngags la phog cing /
NK084(yu)006:1048: thams cad kyis so so'i grub pa thob bo //
NK084(yu)006:1049: 'o na gsang sngags rnying ma'i dpe tsam rgya gar na yang mi bzhugs sam snyam na /
NK084(yu)006:1050: rgyal blon snga dar gyi dus slob dpon zhi ba 'tsho /
NK084(yu)006:1052: bi ma la mi tra la sogs pas pan+di ta bgyis /
NK084(yu)006:1054: gnyags dz+ny+aa na ku m+aa ra /
NK084(yu)006:1057: a tsar+ya ye shes dbyangs la sogs pas lo ts+aa bgyis te /
NK084(yu)006:1058: phyi nang gi rgyud sde ma lus pa bod du bsgyur ba yin /
NK084(yu)006:1059: 'dir yi ges 'jigs pas rgyas par 'khod do //
NK084(yu)006:1060: man ngag rdzogs pa chen po shin tu gsang ba
NK084(yu)006:1061: kun gyi spyod yul du ma gyur te rdo rje
NK084(yu)006:1063: khyim bdag dge ldan bzang po dang /
NK084(yu)006:1064: yum snang gsal dge ldan ma gnyis la sras sh+ri seng+ha 'khrungs te /
NK084(yu)006:1065: lo bco lnga la slob dpon ha ti b+ha li'i
NK084(yu)006:1066: drung du sgra tshad brtsi ba sogs rig gnas lnga
NK084(yu)006:1068: lo nyi shu rtsa lnga la theg pa mchog gi
NK084(yu)006:1069: rgyud lung man ngag dang bcas pa'i dbang khrid zhus
NK084(yu)006:1071: sh+ri sing+ha has bag tsam bton nas bee ro tsa na la bshad /
NK084(yu)006:1072: lhag ma sbas nas yod pa bi ma la rgya gar na bzhugs dus /
NK084(yu)006:1073: bod yul na rgyal po'i bla mchod nyang ting 'dzin
NK084(yu)006:1074: bzang po zhes bya ba sha'i spyan gyis gling bzhi
NK084(yu)006:1075: dus gcig la gzigs pa cig yod pa des pan
NK084(yu)006:1076: chen gyi yon tan gzigs nas rgyal po khri srong
NK084(yu)006:1077: lde'u btsan la rgyu mtshan zhus te /
NK084(yu)006:1078: rgyal pos rgya gar rgyal po la gser gyi 'bul ba bskur nas /
NK084(yu)006:1079: phyi'i lo ts+aa ba rang du bcug pa'i snying nad dang /
NK084(yu)006:1080: bi ma la mi tra dpon g.yog gis rgyal po dang pan+di ta rnams la zhu ba phul ba /
NK084(yu)006:1081: bdag bod du mchis phan chad /
NK084(yu)006:1082: bod du sngon chad yongs su ma grags pa'i chos skor zhig bsgyur dgos byas pas /
NK084(yu)006:1084: rdo rje gdan gyi 'og na man ngag gi chos
NK084(yu)006:1085: sbas nas yod pa de'i skor rgya gar la spyod
NK084(yu)006:1087: khyod bod du 'gro ba la shin tu yus che ba yin pas /
NK084(yu)006:1088: ji ltar rigs pa thon la khyer zer bas /
NK084(yu)006:1089: bi ma la dpon g.yog gis chos ma lus pa
NK084(yu)006:1090: spyan drangs nas rgya gar gyi dpe rtsad chad ces
NK084(yu)006:1091: grags / bi ma la bsam yas su phebs /
NK084(yu)006:1094: rdzogs chen gyi sde gsum chos tha dag bsgyur nas /
NK084(yu)006:1095: mthar rgya nag ri bo rtse lngar sangs rgyas stong
NK084(yu)006:1096: gi bstan pa gnas kyi bar du bzhugs shing lo
NK084(yu)006:1097: brgya na sprul pa re bod du 'byon par zhal
NK084(yu)006:1099: de rnams ni brgyud pa gsum gyi gsang sngags kyi babs tshul spyir bstan pa ste /
NK084(yu)006:1100: da ni bye brag tu chos kyi rang bzhin gtan la dbab pa'i tshul la gnyis te /
NK084(yu)006:1101: theg pa thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i lugs so //
NK084(yu)006:1107: ya na'i sgra las theg pa ste gang la bstan
NK084(yu)006:1108: nas bgrod par 'dod pas phyin cing skyel ba zhes
NK084(yu)006:1110: theg pa 'di ni mkha' 'dra gzhal med khang //
NK084(yu)006:1111: dga' skyid bde ba mngon par thob byed theg pa'i mchog /
NK084(yu)006:1112: de gang zhe na sems can thams cad mya ngan 'das //
NK084(yu)006:1115: spyir dbye ba dang bye brag tu dbye ba'o //
NK084(yu)006:1116: dang po ni sems can gyi rgyud kyi nyon mongs pa 'dul ba'i phyir /
NK084(yu)006:1117: sangs rgyas kyi thugs rjes gang la gang 'dul du
NK084(yu)006:1118: bstan pas theg pa'i rnam grangs kyang 'di nyid kho
NK084(yu)006:1119: nar nges so zhes 'chad pa med de /
NK084(yu)006:1121: sems can rnams ni yongs drang phyir //
NK084(yu)006:1122: theg pa tha dag nges bshad de //
NK084(yu)006:1123: 'di zhes dmigs su yod ma yin //
NK084(yu)006:1125: de yang re zhig bsdu na 'bras bu la dgongs te gcig tu gsungs pa yin /
NK084(yu)006:1126: dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po las /
NK084(yu)006:1127: theg pa gnyis su yod ma yin //
NK084(yu)006:1130: yod ni gcig las med pa las //
NK084(yu)006:1132: yang rgyu dang 'bras bu la dgongs nas gnyis te /
NK084(yu)006:1133: chen po dang chung ngu la dgongs nas gnyis su gsungs te /
NK084(yu)006:1134: dpal 'byung bzhi zad pa'i rgyud las /
NK084(yu)006:1135: rgyu chos rnams dang 'bras bu'i phyir //
NK084(yu)006:1136: theg pa de yang rnam pa gnyis //
NK084(yu)006:1139: che chung rim pa'i blo yod phyir //
NK084(yu)006:1140: theg pa'i grangs kyang de bzhin te //
NK084(yu)006:1141: bsdu na che chung rnam gnyis yod //
NK084(yu)006:1143: yang che 'bring gi dbye ba'i nyan rang theg pa chen po ste gsum du gsungs te /
NK084(yu)006:1145: sbyor ba dang ni tshogs dag la //
NK084(yu)006:1146: bsam pa dang ni bshad nyid dang //
NK084(yu)006:1147: sgrub pa'i rab tu dbye ba yis //
NK084(yu)006:1148: theg pa rnam pa gsum du 'dod //
NK084(yu)006:1150: gsang ba thig le nor bu'i rgyud las /
NK084(yu)006:1151: phyi nang gi rim pas kyang gsum du bshad de /
NK084(yu)006:1152: phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum //
NK084(yu)006:1153: dam pa'i chos kyang rab tu gsungs //
NK084(yu)006:1155: yang rgyu'i theg pa gsum 'bras bu dang bzhir yang bshad /
NK084(yu)006:1157: theg pa gsum gyi nges 'byung la //
NK084(yu)006:1158: theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas //
NK084(yu)006:1161: bsam gyis mi khyab bstan pa 'di //
NK084(yu)006:1162: brgyad khri bzhi stong rnam grangs kyang //
NK084(yu)006:1163: theg pa'i sgo na gsum du gsungs //
NK084(yu)006:1164: gsang nyid theg par bsdus dang bzhi //
NK084(yu)006:1166: yang rnam grangs bsdu ba lngar bshad de /
NK084(yu)006:1168: theg pa bzhi yii nges 'byung la //
NK084(yu)006:1169: theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas //
NK084(yu)006:1172: lha yi theg dang tshangs pa'i theg /
NK084(yu)006:1173: de bzhin du ni nyan thos dang //
NK084(yu)006:1174: de bzhin gshegs dang rang rgyal gyi //
NK084(yu)006:1175: theg pa tha dad par bshad do //
NK084(yu)006:1177: yang sgyu 'phrul gyis gong 'og dbye ba'i drug tu yang bshad de /
NK084(yu)006:1179: nges par thob pa'i theg pa drug /
NK084(yu)006:1183: lha dang mi dang nyan thos dang //
NK084(yu)006:1184: rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems //
NK084(yu)006:1185: gsang ba phyi dang nang gnyis te //
NK084(yu)006:1186: de ltar theg pa bdun du bshad //
NK084(yu)006:1190: de ltar theg brgyad las 'das pa'i //
NK084(yu)006:1194: byung ni theg pa dgu ru byung //
NK084(yu)006:1196: yang sor bzhag lha mi'i theg pa gnyis /
NK084(yu)006:1199: 'od gsal rdo rje snying po'i theg pa dang bcu drug tu yang bshad de /
NK084(yu)006:1200: snying po nyi ma snang byed kyi rgyud las /
NK084(yu)006:1201: theg pa'i dang po bcu drug mgon //
NK084(yu)006:1203: yang bsam gyis mi khyab par bshad de /
NK084(yu)006:1205: ji srid sems ni 'jug pa'i bar //
NK084(yu)006:1206: theg pa'i mtha' la thug pa med //
NK084(yu)006:1207: yang gnas lugs la theg pa zhes btags pa tsam las grub pa med de /
NK084(yu)006:1209: sems ni nam zhig gyur pa na //
NK084(yu)006:1210: theg pa med cing 'gro ba'ang med //
NK084(yu)006:1212: mdor na thams cad blo'i rim pa las snang ba tsam las /
NK084(yu)006:1213: blo ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa'i rnal 'byor pa
NK084(yu)006:1214: rnams la ni theg pa zhes pa'ang gzhi nas med
NK084(yu)006:1215: pa'i nam mkha' bzhin du shes par bya'o //
NK084(yu)006:1216: gnyis pa bye brag tu dbye ba la gnyis te /
NK084(yu)006:1220: rim pa bzhin nyan rang gi theg pa dang /
NK084(yu)006:1221: sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /
NK084(yu)006:1222: theg pa chen po rnams kyi phyi ma mchog ste /
NK084(yu)006:1224: nyan thos rnams kyi 'byor pas ni //
NK084(yu)006:1225: 'jig rten pa ni zil gyis gnon //
NK084(yu)006:1226: rang sangs rgyas kyi 'byor pas ni //
NK084(yu)006:1227: nyan thos nyid kyang zil gyis gnon //
NK084(yu)006:1228: de yis byang chub sems dpa' yi //
NK084(yu)006:1229: 'byor pa'i char yang mi phod do //
NK084(yu)006:1230: de yis de bzhin gshegs pa yi //
NK084(yu)006:1231: 'byor pa'i char yang mi phod do //
NK084(yu)006:1232: zhes sogs theg chen de yang khyad par 'phags tshul
NK084(yu)006:1233: gyi rnam grangs mang na'ang bsdu na bdun du 'dus
NK084(yu)006:1235: dmigs pa che ba nyid dang ni //
NK084(yu)006:1236: de bzhin sgrub pa gnyis dag dang //
NK084(yu)006:1237: ye shes brtson 'grus brtsam pa dang //
NK084(yu)006:1238: thabs la mkhas par gyur pa dang //
NK084(yu)006:1239: yang dag sgrub pa chen po dang //
NK084(yu)006:1240: sangs rgyas phrin las chen po ste //
NK084(yu)006:1241: chen po bdun dang ldan pa'i phyir //
NK084(yu)006:1242: theg chen zhes ni nges par brjod //
NK084(yu)006:1244: de las kyang gsang sngags 'bras bu'i theg pa khyad par 'phags te /
NK084(yu)006:1246: don gcig nam yang ma rmongs dang //
NK084(yu)006:1247: thabs mang dka' ba med phyir dang //
NK084(yu)006:1248: dbang po rnon po'i dbang byas pas //
NK084(yu)006:1249: sngags kyi theg pa khyad par 'phags //
NK084(yu)006:1251: mdo gdams ngag 'bogs pa'i rgyal por /
NK084(yu)006:1253: 'dren pa'i theg pa gsum po dag /
NK084(yu)006:1254: bcom ldan nges par gsungs lags na //
NK084(yu)006:1255: rgyu 'bras lhun grub tu spyod cing //
NK084(yu)006:1256: sangs rgyas gzhan nas mi 'tshol ba'i //
NK084(yu)006:1257: nges pa'i theg pa cis ma gsungs //
NK084(yu)006:1260: rgyu la mos pa rgyu chos kyi //
NK084(yu)006:1261: 'khor lo rab tu bskor byas na //
NK084(yu)006:1262: rdo rje theg pa'i nye lam ni //
NK084(yu)006:1264: zhes sngags ni 'bras bu lam du byed pa dang /
NK084(yu)006:1265: sangs rgyas rang la yod pa nges don mthar thug gi theg pa ste /
NK084(yu)006:1266: lung 'di gnyis kyis sdom gsum rab dbyer /
NK084(yu)006:1267: pha rol phyin pa'i spros bral las //
NK084(yu)006:1268: lhag pa'i lta ba yod na ni //
NK084(yu)006:1269: lta de spros pa can du 'gyur //
NK084(yu)006:1271: lung snga ma'i ma rmongs pa dang //
NK084(yu)006:1272: dbang po rnon po zhes pa ni /
NK084(yu)006:1273: mdo las sngags shes rab tu zhugs pa'i lta ba'ang de'i khyad par nyid dang /
NK084(yu)006:1274: lung phyi ma'i rgyu 'bras lhun grub tu zhes sogs
NK084(yu)006:1275: kyis rdo rje theg pa zung 'jug bde ba chen
NK084(yu)006:1276: po'i ye shes mngon du byed pa'o //
NK084(yu)006:1277: de yang rdo rje gur las /
NK084(yu)006:1278: dman pa rnams la bya ba'i rgyud //
NK084(yu)006:1279: bya min rnal 'byor de ltag la //
NK084(yu)006:1280: sems can mchog la rnal 'byor mchog /
NK084(yu)006:1281: rnal 'byor bla med de ltag la'o //
NK084(yu)006:1282: zhes snga ma snga ma bas phyi ma phyi ma mchog tu gsungs so //
NK084(yu)006:1283: gnyis pa sngags nyid bshad pa la gnyis te /
NK084(yu)006:1284: rgyud sde bzhir grangs nges pa'i rgyu mtshan dang /
NK084(yu)006:1285: rnam grangs so sor bstan pa'o //
NK084(yu)006:1287: dang po mi rigs bzhi la dgongs nas gsungs pa ni /
NK084(yu)006:1288: bram ze khrus dang gtsang sbra gtso 'khor ston pa la bya rgyud /
NK084(yu)006:1289: rje'u rigs phyi khrus dang gtsang sbra nang ngo tsha dang khrel yod kyis gnas pa la spyod rgyud /
NK084(yu)006:1290: rgyal rigs yon tan dang 'byor pas yul skyong ba la rnal 'byor rgyud /
NK084(yu)006:1291: dmangs rigs gtsang btsog chung zhing nyon mongs rags par spyod pa la bla med rgyud gsungs te /
NK084(yu)006:1292: bde mchog rol pa'i rgyud las /
NK084(yu)006:1293: bya ba bram ze gtsang dang bstun //
NK084(yu)006:1294: spyod pa rje'u rigs de bas lhag /
NK084(yu)006:1296: gzhi dmangs gdod nas grol ba ste //
NK084(yu)006:1297: gzhan du su la'ang ma bstan par //
NK084(yu)006:1298: mdzes ma khyod la bstan pa ni //
NK084(yu)006:1300: dur khrod rgyan gyi rgyud las /
NK084(yu)006:1301: bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dang //
NK084(yu)006:1302: dmangs rigs gdol pa 'dul don du //
NK084(yu)006:1303: rgyud ni rnam pa bzhir gsungs te //
NK084(yu)006:1304: bya spyod rnal 'byor bla med do //
NK084(yu)006:1306: gnyis pa gang zag gi blo rigs bzhi la dgongs nas gsungs pa ni /
NK084(yu)006:1307: dbang po tha ma la bya ba /
NK084(yu)006:1311: gur du lung sngar drangs zin pa ltar ro //
NK084(yu)006:1312: gsum pa dus la ltos nas bzhir gsungs te /
NK084(yu)006:1313: bskal pa dang po rdzogs ldan gyii dus su bya rgyud /
NK084(yu)006:1314: sum ldan gyi dus su spyod rgyud //
NK084(yu)006:1316: rtsod ldan la bla med do //
NK084(yu)006:1317: lha thams cad yang dag pa 'dus pa'i rgyud las /
NK084(yu)006:1318: rdzogs ldan dang po bya ba'i rgyud //
NK084(yu)006:1319: sum ldan gnyis pa spyod pa'i rgyud //
NK084(yu)006:1320: gnyis ldan gsum pa rnal 'byor rgyud //
NK084(yu)006:1321: rtsod ldan bzhi pa bla med do //
NK084(yu)006:1322: dus bzhi la ni dgongs nas kyang //
NK084(yu)006:1323: rgyud kyang rnam pa bzhir bshad do //
NK084(yu)006:1325: bzhi pa sbyang gzhi 'dod chags kyi 'jug tshul bzhi la dgongs nas bzhir gsungs te /
NK084(yu)006:1326: rdzogs ldan gyi dus su nyon mongs pa shas chung bas bltas pas tshim pa la bya rgyud de /
NK084(yu)006:1328: dkar pos ras la brtag bya zhing //
NK084(yu)006:1329: dkyil 'khor gyi ni lha tshogs rnams //
NK084(yu)006:1330: mo yang pho la blta ba dang //
NK084(yu)006:1331: pho yang mo la blta ba bri //
NK084(yu)006:1333: sum ldan gyi dus su bgad pas tshim pa'i 'dod
NK084(yu)006:1334: chags byung ste de'i don du spyod pa'i rgyud de
NK084(yu)006:1336: mgon po ral pa'i thor tshugs can //
NK084(yu)006:1337: de yi g.yon phyogs lha mo ni //
NK084(yu)006:1338: cung zad mig ni 'dzums bcas bri //
NK084(yu)006:1340: gnyis ldan gyi dus su reg cing 'khyud pas tshim pa'i 'dod chags can la rnal 'byor rgyud de /
NK084(yu)006:1342: dkyil 'khor gyi ni lha tshogs rnams //
NK084(yu)006:1343: dpung pa yin tsam bsdam par bzhag /
NK084(yu)006:1345: de nas yo ga'i lha rnams phyag rgya 'brel bar 'byung ngo //
NK084(yu)006:1346: rtsod ldan gyi dus su dbang po gnyis sbyor gyi 'dod chags can 'dul don du bla med de /
NK084(yu)006:1348: bo la kak+ko la sbyar bas //
NK084(yu)006:1349: de yi bde ba khyad par 'phags //
NK084(yu)006:1352: dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis //
NK084(yu)006:1353: dngos po thams cad brtag par bya //
NK084(yu)006:1356: mtshan ma gnyis la sngags byas te //
NK084(yu)006:1357: sngags pas mkha' 'gro ma la sbyar //
NK084(yu)006:1359: 'dod lha'i rim pa yang bzhag ste /
NK084(yu)006:1360: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyis bltas pas tshim pa la bya ba /
NK084(yu)006:1361: 'khrul dga' bgad pas tshim pa la spyod pa /
NK084(yu)006:1362: dga' ldan la sogs lag bcang la rnal 'byor /
NK084(yu)006:1363: sum cu rtsa gsum man chad dbang po gnyis sbyor ba bla med /
NK084(yu)006:1365: bltas dang bgad dang lag bcang dang //
NK084(yu)006:1366: gnyis gnyis 'khyud pa gang yin la //
NK084(yu)006:1367: srin bu yi ni tshul gyis su //
NK084(yu)006:1368: rgyud ni rnam pa bzhir gsungs so //
NK084(yu)006:1370: lnga pa lha bzhi'i rjes su 'jug pa phyin ci log pa bzhi ni /
NK084(yu)006:1371: gti mug tshangs pa gtsang sbra chos su smra ste /
NK084(yu)006:1373: 'dag chal dag gis bgos pa'i gos //
NK084(yu)006:1374: dri ma med par 'gyur ba bzhin //
NK084(yu)006:1375: lus la mchod sbyin gyis bgos la //
NK084(yu)006:1376: 'bab stegs bkrus pa de yis dag /
NK084(yu)006:1377: ces pa'i tshul gyis bya rgyud do //
NK084(yu)006:1378: zhe sdang khyab 'jug 'tshe ba chos su smra ba'i don du spyod rgyud de /
NK084(yu)006:1380: rgyal rigs la ni rgyal rigs dang //
NK084(yu)006:1381: bram ze la ni bram zes bsad //
NK084(yu)006:1383: e ma ho gsod pa 'di ni bzang //
NK084(yu)006:1384: bsad pas byang chub thob par byed do //
NK084(yu)006:1386: nga rgyal brgya byin rjes su gzung ba'i phyir rnal 'byor rgyud de /
NK084(yu)006:1387: dbang phyug 'byor pa lha yi rgyud //
NK084(yu)006:1390: 'dod chags dbang phyug ni 'dod chags chos su smra ste /
NK084(yu)006:1391: goo tam bud med me yin te //
NK084(yu)006:1392: de yi nye gnas thab khung yin //
NK084(yu)006:1393: zhes pa 'dul ba bla mar gsungs te /
NK084(yu)006:1395: bud med gzugs dang mdangs bzang ma //
NK084(yu)006:1396: lo grangs bcu drug len pa la /
NK084(yu)006:1397: byin gyis brlabs te lan gsum du //
NK084(yu)006:1398: dben par mchod pa rab tu brtsams //
NK084(yu)006:1399: gnyis pa rnam grangs so sor nges pa la phyi nang gnyis so //
NK084(yu)006:1403: nges tshig ni kri la ste /
NK084(yu)006:1404: khrus dang gtsang sbra gtso bor ston pa bya rgyud de /
NK084(yu)006:1406: gzhi chos rnams ngo bo nyid med par rtogs nas
NK084(yu)006:1407: lha ye shes sems dpa' rgyal po lta bu la
NK084(yu)006:1408: dngos grub 'dod pa'i gzhir byed do //
NK084(yu)006:1409: lam ni lha bskyed nas mchod pa 'bul bas de
NK084(yu)006:1410: kho na nyid la sogs pas dka' spyad dang gtsang
NK084(yu)006:1411: sbra'i rang bzhin la brten no //
NK084(yu)006:1412: 'bras bu mi tshe bcu drug na sangs rgyas nas byang chub thob par 'dod de /
NK084(yu)006:1414: kri yas bdag dang lha gnyis rje khol tshul //
NK084(yu)006:1415: mi tshe bcu drug 'bad pas grol ba thob //
NK084(yu)006:1418: nges tshig u pa ya ste spyod pa kri ya
NK084(yu)006:1419: dang mthun zhing sgom pa yo ga dang mthun nas
NK084(yu)006:1420: gnyis bcas kyi theg pa zhes so //
NK084(yu)006:1422: gzhi ngo bo nyid med pa'i shes rab dang lha
NK084(yu)006:1423: gnyis dam tshig pa dang ye shes pa'i tshul du
NK084(yu)006:1424: mnyam par 'dod pa'i thabs la dngos grub 'dod pa'i
NK084(yu)006:1425: rtogs pa'o // lam de ltar bsgom zhing kri ya
NK084(yu)006:1426: ltar gtsang sbra spyod pas mi tshe bdun nas grol
NK084(yu)006:1429: u pa bdag dang lha gnyis mnyam por mthong //
NK084(yu)006:1430: grogs po'i tshul gyis dngos grub ster 'dod pa //
NK084(yu)006:1431: mi tshe bdun na grol ba'i dngos grub thob //
NK084(yu)006:1434: nges tshig ni yo ga ste sems kyi gtso la lta spyod gnyis grogs su 'dod pa'o //
NK084(yu)006:1436: gzhi ngo bo nyid med pa'i shes rab dang /
NK084(yu)006:1437: bdag lhar gsal ba la ye shes pa chu la chu bzhag pa ltar gnas pas gzhir byed pa'o //
NK084(yu)006:1438: lam de ltar bsgom zhing gtsang sbra kun tu spyod pa grogs su ldan pas /
NK084(yu)006:1439: mi tshe gsum na stug po bkod pa'i sar grol bar 'dod de /
NK084(yu)006:1441: yo ga stug po bkod 'dod pa //
NK084(yu)006:1442: mi tshe gsum na grol bar 'dod //
NK084(yu)006:1444: gsang sngags nang pa gsum ste /
NK084(yu)006:1445: dang po rnal 'byor pa'i rgyud la'ang gnyis las /
NK084(yu)006:1446: nges tshig ni ma h+aa yo ga'i sgra las thabs kyi rnal 'byor bskyed pa dang /
NK084(yu)006:1447: rlung gtso bor grol bar bshad do //
NK084(yu)006:1449: ye nas dag pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor rlung gi byed pa'o //
NK084(yu)006:1450: lam ni de dag sgom pa'o //
NK084(yu)006:1451: 'bras bu ni tshe 'di nyid la grol bar 'dod pa ste /
NK084(yu)006:1453: bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa las //
NK084(yu)006:1454: ye shes rlung gi las byed cing //
NK084(yu)006:1455: nam mkha'i 'jo ba rab rdzogs pa'i //
NK084(yu)006:1456: tshe gcig gis ni rab grol lo //
NK084(yu)006:1458: shes rab ma'i rgyud la'ang gnyis las /
NK084(yu)006:1459: nges tshig ni a nu yo ga ste shes rab
NK084(yu)006:1460: rdzogs pa'i rim pa dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med
NK084(yu)006:1461: du 'dod pa'o // dbye na gnyis las /
NK084(yu)006:1462: gzhi ye nas dag pa lha'i rang bzhin dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'o //
NK084(yu)006:1464: 'bras bu tshe 'dir bde ba chen po'i sku mngon du byed pa'o //
NK084(yu)006:1465: thig le mchog gi rgyud las /
NK084(yu)006:1467: dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med par //
NK084(yu)006:1468: bde ba chen po su bsgom pa //
NK084(yu)006:1471: gnyis su med pa'i rgyu la'ang gnyis las /
NK084(yu)006:1474: skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kun gyi snying
NK084(yu)006:1475: po la 'jug pas chos thams cad ye nas sangs
