NK084(yu)006:1478: gzhi snang srid 'khor 'das kyi chos so cog ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin no //
NK084(yu)006:1479: lam bskyed rdzogs gnyis su blang dor re dog las 'das par byed pa'o //
NK084(yu)006:1480: 'bras bu lhun rdzogs kun tu bzang po'i sa la
NK084(yu)006:1481: da lta nyid nas gnas par mthar phyin par byed
NK084(yu)006:1482: pa ste / theg pa 'dir thams cad rdzogs pa ste /
NK084(yu)006:1484: mnyam nyid don rtogs rang rig rgyal po dang //
NK084(yu)006:1485: bla med don rtogs thabs chen 'di dag tu //
NK084(yu)006:1486: rgya mtsho chen por chu klung kun babs ltar //
NK084(yu)006:1487: rnam par thar pa bsam yas ma lus 'dus //
NK084(yu)006:1489: 'di dag ni smin byed dbang gi rim pa gnyis /
NK084(yu)006:1491: rgyud sde gang du dbang bzhi tshang ba mi ston zhing /
NK084(yu)006:1492: khyad par du rig pa'i dbang tsam las mi 'dod pa ni phyi pa ste /
NK084(yu)006:1493: dpal ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud las /
NK084(yu)006:1494: bum pa chu yis dbang bskur bas //
NK084(yu)006:1495: bya ba'i rgyud la zhugs pa ste //
NK084(yu)006:1496: cod pan gyis ni dbang bskur bas //
NK084(yu)006:1497: spyod pa'i rgyud la zhugs pa yin //
NK084(yu)006:1498: rdo rje dril bu byin pa yis //
NK084(yu)006:1499: rnal 'byor rgyud du rtogs pa dang //
NK084(yu)006:1502: chu yi dbang bskur cod pan dbang //
NK084(yu)006:1503: bya ba'i rgyud la rab tu grags //
NK084(yu)006:1504: rdo rje dril bu de bzhin ming //
NK084(yu)006:1505: spyod pa'i rgyud la rab tu gsal //
NK084(yu)006:1506: phyir mi ldog pa yi ni dbang //
NK084(yu)006:1507: rnal 'byor rgyud du gsal bar bya //
NK084(yu)006:1508: de nas drug gi bye brag dbang //
NK084(yu)006:1509: de ni slob dpon dbang zhes bya //
NK084(yu)006:1510: rnal 'byor bla ma yi ni mtshan //
NK084(yu)006:1511: gsang ba yi ni dbang rgyal bshad //
NK084(yu)006:1512: shes rab ye shes bla na med //
NK084(yu)006:1513: bzhi pa de ltar de bzhin no //
NK084(yu)006:1514: zhes bum pa'i dbang yan chad phyi pa'o //
NK084(yu)006:1515: rgyud sde gang du dbang bzhi rdzogs par bskur ba nang pa yin te /
NK084(yu)006:1517: bum pa'i dbang bskur dang po ste //
NK084(yu)006:1518: gnyis pa gsang ba'i dbang bskur dang //
NK084(yu)006:1519: gsum pa shes rab ye shes te //
NK084(yu)006:1520: bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no //
NK084(yu)006:1522: gsum pa 'bras bu la gnyis te /
NK084(yu)006:1524: dang po bid+y+aa d+h+aa ra zhes pas /
NK084(yu)006:1525: bid+y+aa d+h+aa ni rig pa ste /
NK084(yu)006:1526: shes rab ye shes kyi sangs rgyas kyi gdung ngo //
NK084(yu)006:1527: d+h+aa ra ni 'dzin zhing 'chang ba ste /
NK084(yu)006:1528: don la slob pa'am ldan pa yin no //
NK084(yu)006:1530: dbye ba spyir bstan pa dang /
NK084(yu)006:1531: rang bzhin bye brag tu bshad pa'o //
NK084(yu)006:1534: rnam smin tshe dbang phyag rgya lhun gyis grub //
NK084(yu)006:1536: rnam par smin pa'i rig 'dzin ni //
NK084(yu)006:1539: lhun gyis grub pa'i rig 'dzin no //
NK084(yu)006:1540: dang po mtshan nyid gsum ldan te /
NK084(yu)006:1541: yi dam lha'i rnal 'byor du smin pa /
NK084(yu)006:1542: lus rnam smin gyi gzugs las gnas ma gyur pa
NK084(yu)006:1543: lus rgya dang bral nas phyag rgya chen po'i sku
NK084(yu)006:1544: thob pa ste / rngam glog las /
NK084(yu)006:1545: yid kyis lha yi gzugs bzung zhing //
NK084(yu)006:1546: lus kyi rgya mdud grol gyur nas //
NK084(yu)006:1547: phyag rgya'i sku nyid gsal gyur pa //
NK084(yu)006:1548: lus rgya dang bral nas phyag rgya chen po'i sku thob pa ste /
NK084(yu)006:1551: rnam smin gyi lus rdo rje'i lus su gyur te
NK084(yu)006:1552: de nyid ma spangs par sangs rgyas kyi sa la
NK084(yu)006:1553: sbyor bas phung po'i zag pa med cing ye shes
NK084(yu)006:1555: lus dang phung por bcas pa yi //
NK084(yu)006:1556: gnas par dbang ba'i rigs grub phyir //
NK084(yu)006:1558: zag bcas zad pa'i rigs chen de //
NK084(yu)006:1559: ji ltar bcad kyang bzlog pa min //
NK084(yu)006:1560: rang dbang thob pa'i dbugs dbyung phyir //
NK084(yu)006:1561: skabs su bden pa bar ma mthong //
NK084(yu)006:1563: gsum pa ni rang gi lus gang bsgom pa'i cha byad du dbang gyur pa ste /
NK084(yu)006:1565: rang lus rgyal ba'i phyag rgya che //
NK084(yu)006:1566: bsgom pas mngon du gyur pa'i lha //
NK084(yu)006:1567: mtshan dang dpe byad mngon shes ldan //
NK084(yu)006:1568: phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin grags //
NK084(yu)006:1570: 'o na sangs rgyas dngos su gyur mod snyam na /
NK084(yu)006:1571: da dung sgrib pa mtha' dag dang ma bral bas bsgrub dgos te /
NK084(yu)006:1573: sangs rgyas nyid ni thob pa dang //
NK084(yu)006:1575: dang po sangs rgyas thob par bshad kyang /
NK084(yu)006:1576: sa lhag ma'i dri ma sbyang dgos par gsungs pa bzhin du 'dir yang shes par bya ste /
NK084(yu)006:1578: byang chub phyag rgya'i cha lugs sku //
NK084(yu)006:1579: mtshan dang dpe byad la sogs pas //
NK084(yu)006:1580: cha lugs mngon du gyur na yang //
NK084(yu)006:1581: zhi ba de nyid mthong ba min //
NK084(yu)006:1583: bzhi pa ni spangs pa dang /
NK084(yu)006:1584: rtogs pa mthar phyin pas sangs rgyas te /
NK084(yu)006:1586: snga ma'i rigs las mthu rdzogs pas //
NK084(yu)006:1587: bshad pa bzhin du dri ma sbyangs //
NK084(yu)006:1588: sangs rgyas pa yi shes rab gsum //
NK084(yu)006:1589: lhun gyis grub pa'i rig 'dzin no //
NK084(yu)006:1591: gnyis pa rang bzhin bye brag tu bshad pa la bzhi ste /
NK084(yu)006:1593: zag pa med pa'i bsdus tshul /
NK084(yu)006:1594: pha rol phyin pa'i rdzogs tshul /
NK084(yu)006:1595: mthar thug pa'i rdzogs tshul lo //
NK084(yu)006:1596: dang po ni rig 'dzin de dag gis 'gro ba'i
NK084(yu)006:1597: don du mi'i gtso bo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal
NK084(yu)006:1598: po dang / lha'i gtso bo tshangs pa dang brgya byin la sogs pa dang /
NK084(yu)006:1599: tshangs pa chen po'i skye bar sprul nas gang la gang 'dul gyi don byed do //
NK084(yu)006:1600: kha cig rnam smin gyis mi /
NK084(yu)006:1602: phyag rgya chen pos tshangs pa /
NK084(yu)006:1603: lhun grub kun gyi rol par bzhed de 'gal ba med do //
NK084(yu)006:1604: gnyis pa la rnam smin tshogs sbyor mthar thug gi sa dang /
NK084(yu)006:1605: tshe dbang mthong lam man chad slob pa'i sa dang /
NK084(yu)006:1606: phyag rgya chen po 'phags pa'i ye shes /
NK084(yu)006:1607: mthong sgom gyi rtogs pa khyad par can gyi sa dang /
NK084(yu)006:1608: lhun grub sangs rgyas kyi sas bsdus kyang /
NK084(yu)006:1609: de thams cad phyogs gcig tu khyad par gyi sa bcu gsum pas bsdus te /
NK084(yu)006:1610: der nges par mthong du byed pa ste /
NK084(yu)006:1611: dper na lcags kyus zin pa'i nya chu nang na yod kyang skam sar bton pa dang 'dra'o //
NK084(yu)006:1612: de yang 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi cha nas phyag rgya chen po dang /
NK084(yu)006:1613: skye shi med pa'i cha nas tshe dbang du btags pa'o //
NK084(yu)006:1616: sar smin pa ste gsum du'ang bshad de /
NK084(yu)006:1617: kha cig dang po tshe dbang phyag rgya brgyad pa
NK084(yu)006:1618: lhun grub bcu par 'dod pa ni sgyu 'phrul gyi
NK084(yu)006:1620: de tshe bcu drug yan chad kyi //
NK084(yu)006:1621: sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs pa ni //
NK084(yu)006:1623: lus ma bor bar sangs rgyas pa //
NK084(yu)006:1624: zhes lhun grub sangs rgyas su bshad pa dang 'gal zhing /
NK084(yu)006:1625: tshe dbang dang phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ma chad par snang ngo //
NK084(yu)006:1626: gsum pa ni rim gyis pas pha rol tu phyin
NK084(yu)006:1627: pa bcu rim gyis sbyangs shing sa bcu 'phar bar
NK084(yu)006:1628: ston la / cig car bas myur du rdzogs pa ste /
NK084(yu)006:1629: de'ang chos thams cad la yongs su 'dzin pa med
NK084(yu)006:1630: pa dang sbyin pas pha rol phyin pa 'bras bu
NK084(yu)006:1631: dang bcas pa rtsol ba med par lhun grub kyis
NK084(yu)006:1633: de bzhin du mnyam pa nyid du rigs pas gos
NK084(yu)006:1634: pa med pa dang blang dor med pa ni tshul
NK084(yu)006:1635: khrims so // 'khrugs pa med pa dang ye shes kyi mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa ni bzod pa'o //
NK084(yu)006:1636: nyams pa med pa dang bya spyod tshogs su 'gyur ba ni brtson 'grus /
NK084(yu)006:1637: dbang po yul las 'jug kyang mnyam pa nyid las
NK084(yu)006:1638: mi g.yo zhing chos kyi rang bzhin la gnas pa
NK084(yu)006:1640: rang bzhin phyin ci ma log pa rtogs pas dngos
NK084(yu)006:1641: po dang mtshan mar 'dzin pa las 'das pa ni
NK084(yu)006:1642: shes rab bo // bdag kyang gzhan don du 'gyur ba thabs so //
NK084(yu)006:1643: zhing dang spyod yul yongs dag tu 'byung ba ni smon lam mo //
NK084(yu)006:1644: mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis yongs su mi bardzi ba ni stobs so //
NK084(yu)006:1645: don ji lta ba bzhin rtogs pa ni ye shes te /
NK084(yu)006:1646: pha rol tu phyin pa sa bcu lhun gyis rdzogs pas sa bcu pa dang /
NK084(yu)006:1647: ring mo zhig tu sbyangs mi dgos par myur du rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
NK084(yu)006:1648: yon tan ni sa dang po skad cig snga phyi
NK084(yu)006:1649: med bzhin du sangs rgyas brgya'i zhal blta ba la
NK084(yu)006:1650: sogs pa brgya phrag bcu gnyis mngon du byed de
NK084(yu)006:1652: ting 'dzin brgya dang sangs rgyas brgya rnams mthong byed cing //
NK084(yu)006:1653: zhing brgya bskyod cing rab tu snang byed kun tu 'gro //
NK084(yu)006:1654: sems can brgya skyong chos kyi sgo la 'god par byed //
NK084(yu)006:1655: bskal pa brgyar 'jug lus brgya bar du ston par byed //
NK084(yu)006:1656: rgyal ba'i sras kyang brgya yi grangs tshang rab tu ston //
NK084(yu)006:1657: de yi gong na sman pa stobs ldan tshad kyang med //
NK084(yu)006:1659: de bzhin du sa gnyis par stong phrag bcu gnyis /
NK084(yu)006:1661: bzhi par bye ba brgya phrag bcu gnyis /
NK084(yu)006:1662: lnga par bye ba stong phrag bcu gnyis /
NK084(yu)006:1663: drug par bye ba khrag khrig bcu gnyis /
NK084(yu)006:1664: bdun par khrag khrig 'bum phrag bcu gnyis /
NK084(yu)006:1665: brgyad par stong chen 'bum phrag gcig gi rdul gyi grangs dang mnyam pa /
NK084(yu)006:1666: dgu par 'bum phrag bcu'i rdul dang mnyam pa /
NK084(yu)006:1667: bcu par brjod du med pa'i grangs dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhal blta ba dang /
NK084(yu)006:1669: zhing g.yo bar byed pa dang /
NK084(yu)006:1670: 'od kyis gsal bar byed pa dang /
NK084(yu)006:1671: zhing de dag tu 'gro ba dang /
NK084(yu)006:1672: sems can smin par byed pa dang /
NK084(yu)006:1674: ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog pa dang /
NK084(yu)006:1675: dus skad cig ma gcig bskal pa du mar ston zhing /
NK084(yu)006:1676: bskal pa du mar skad cig ma cig ston pa dang /
NK084(yu)006:1677: sngon du phyi ma'i mtha' de snyed la gzigs pa 'jug pa dang /
NK084(yu)006:1678: rang gi lus sangs rgyas kyi sku du mar 'phrul pa dang /
NK084(yu)006:1679: de re re la'ang 'khor du mas bskor bar ston
NK084(yu)006:1680: pa rnams skad cig snga phyi med par 'byung ngo
NK084(yu)006:1681: // bzhi pa mthar thug pa'i thob tshul ni /
NK084(yu)006:1682: de ltar sa bcu rdzogs nas 'od zer mang po bkye ste sems can gyi don mdzad pa /
NK084(yu)006:1683: bcu gcig kun tu 'od kyi sa dang /
NK084(yu)006:1684: ye shes kyi snang ba dang /
NK084(yu)006:1685: thugs rje chen pos chags pa med pa bcu gnyis ma chags pa pad+ma can gyi sa dang /
NK084(yu)006:1686: chos thams cad dbang mthar thug pa lhun gyis rdzogs pa bcu gsum rdo rje 'dzin pa'am /
NK084(yu)006:1689: rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa zhes bya ba lhun gyis rdzogs pa'o //
NK084(yu)006:1690: de yang sa bcu gsum pa 'di nyid chos sku
NK084(yu)006:1691: spros dang bral ba'i cha nas khyad par chen po
NK084(yu)006:1692: de'i ngang las longs sku'i 'char gzhi byed pas yi
NK084(yu)006:1694: de nyid kun gyi bla ma yin pas rdo rje 'dzin pa /
NK084(yu)006:1695: ye shes mthar thug gi ngo bo yin pas rig
NK084(yu)006:1696: pa 'dzin pa zhes yon tan gyi cha nas de
NK084(yu)006:1698: sa 'di dag la skas kyi gdang bu ltar mtho dman yod pa ma yin te /
NK084(yu)006:1699: sangs rgyas gcig gi ngo bo la sku gsum gyi cha nas de skad ces brjod do //
NK084(yu)006:1700: yon tan gyis phye ba'i de dang de las mang
NK084(yu)006:1701: bar yang gsungs te bde ba tshad med pa bcu
NK084(yu)006:1702: bzhi pa bde ba chen po /
NK084(yu)006:1704: bcu drug pa ye shes bla ma zhes grags shing /
NK084(yu)006:1705: don gyi ngo bo la grub bsal med pa gcig tu'ang bshad /
NK084(yu)006:1706: kun tu bzang po dbye ba med pa rdzogs pa chen po sa gcig pa ste /
NK084(yu)006:1708: gcig ni kun byed byang chub sems kyi sa //
NK084(yu)006:1711: spyi don gnyis pa thun mong ma yin pa gsum
NK084(yu)006:1712: ste rdzogs pa chen po sde gsum gyi rnam grangs
NK084(yu)006:1713: bkod pa / rgyud kyi 'chad thabs bstan pa /
NK084(yu)006:1716: 'og ma las 'phags tshul khyad par can gyi gsang chen nyid bshad pa'o //
NK084(yu)006:1718: byang chub sems kun byed rgyal po lta ba nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las /
NK084(yu)006:1719: kye sems dpa' chen po 'di nyon cig /'khor gyi ston pa rnam gsum gyis //
NK084(yu)006:1720: bstan pa gsum ni gol sgrib med //
NK084(yu)006:1721: de yang ji lta bu zhe na //
NK084(yu)006:1722: nges pa'i thob pa'i theg pa drug /
NK084(yu)006:1723: rdzogs pa chen po gol sar bstan //
NK084(yu)006:1725: rdzogs pa chen po rgyu 'bras gnyis ltar na //
NK084(yu)006:1726: a nu yo gar gol bar bshad //
NK084(yu)006:1728: 'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
NK084(yu)006:1730: rdzogs pa chen po'i lta spyod ni //
NK084(yu)006:1732: lta spyod byang chub sems 'di ni //
NK084(yu)006:1733: nam mkha' lta bu'i rang bzhin te //
NK084(yu)006:1735: lta ba bsgom med dam tshig bsrung du med //
NK084(yu)006:1736: sa la sbyang med lam la bgrod du med //
NK084(yu)006:1737: phrin las rtsol med dbang la bskur du med //
NK084(yu)006:1738: sgo gsum rtsol med dkyil 'khor bskyed du med //
NK084(yu)006:1739: rgyu 'bras gnyis med nam mkha' lta bu'o //
NK084(yu)006:1741: gang zag blang dor byed pa des //
NK084(yu)006:1742: byang chub nam mkha' de mi 'grub //
NK084(yu)006:1743: blang zhing dor ba gol sgrib lo //
NK084(yu)006:1745: gnyis pa khyad par can gyi gsang chen nyid bshad pa la skor gsum ste /
NK084(yu)006:1748: gsang ba man ngag gi sde'i skor de la'ang bkod pa chen po las /
NK084(yu)006:1751: yid can rnams la sems kyi sde //
NK084(yu)006:1752: nam mkha' can la klong gi sde //
NK084(yu)006:1753: rim rtsol bral la man ngag sde //
NK084(yu)006:1755: de'ang phyi nang gi chos rnams don gzhan nam dkyil
NK084(yu)006:1756: 'khor la sogs pa mtha' gcig tu zhen pa rnams
NK084(yu)006:1757: la gnyis 'dzin rang rgyud pa spang ba'i phyir thams
NK084(yu)006:1758: cad rang byung ye shes kyi rol pa ste /
NK084(yu)006:1759: ma dag pa'i snod bcud dang bcas pa sems kyi
NK084(yu)006:1760: 'khrul snang dag pa myang 'das kyi snang ba dang
NK084(yu)006:1761: rol par bstan pas gnyis med mtha' grol chen por
NK084(yu)006:1762: dbyings su sdud pa'i dgos pa yod do //
NK084(yu)006:1763: gnyis brgyud kyi 'chad thabs bstan pa la gnyis te /
NK084(yu)006:1767: e ma ho rdo rje 'dzin pa nyon //
NK084(yu)006:1768: de nyid rnam par bshad bya ba //
NK084(yu)006:1769: don gyi rgyud dang sems kyi rgyud //
NK084(yu)006:1770: ces pa'i don gyi rgyud la'ang thabs rgyud dang /
NK084(yu)006:1772: dang po la'ang mtshon bya thabs kyi rgyud dang /
NK084(yu)006:1773: mtshon byed thabs kyi rgyud do //
NK084(yu)006:1775: gzhi gcig ngo bo'i khyad par las //
NK084(yu)006:1776: mtshon bya dang ni mtshon byed med //
NK084(yu)006:1778: gnyis pa rang bzhin gyi rgyud ni /
NK084(yu)006:1779: rig pa rang 'od sgron ma dang bcas te /
NK084(yu)006:1781: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin ni //
NK084(yu)006:1782: rgyud kyi snying po rab tu dbye //
NK084(yu)006:1784: 'di nyid shes pa ma yin te //
NK084(yu)006:1785: mi 'byed rdo rje'i rang bzhin can //
NK084(yu)006:1786: rang rgyud mtshon pa'i gzhi gcig pa'i //
NK084(yu)006:1787: rang bzhin stong pa nyid du gcig /
NK084(yu)006:1788: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskyed pa'i yum //
NK084(yu)006:1790: gnyis pa tshig rgyud 'chad pa ni /
NK084(yu)006:1791: bshad thabs kyi man ngag mang na yang /
NK084(yu)006:1792: 'dir gsang chen bla na med pa'i rgyud bcu bdun
NK084(yu)006:1793: gyi dgongs pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas chings chen po
NK084(yu)006:1794: lnga dang yan lag bzhis shes par bya ba ni
NK084(yu)006:1796: lo rgyus don gyis ma bshad na //
NK084(yu)006:1797: gsang chen nges pa'i bka' 'di la //
NK084(yu)006:1798: yid mi ches pa'i skyon du 'gyur //
NK084(yu)006:1799: rtsa ba'i don gyis ma bshad na //
NK084(yu)006:1800: chos rnams rig par mi 'dus pas //
NK084(yu)006:1801: mtha' yas pa yi skyon du 'gyur //
NK084(yu)006:1802: yo ga'i don gyis ma bshad na //
NK084(yu)006:1803: theg pa'i ru shan mi phyed pas //
NK084(yu)006:1804: che chung rig pa don med 'gyur //
NK084(yu)006:1805: tshig gi don gyis ma bshad na //
NK084(yu)006:1806: rgyud rnams rim par gsal ba'i tshig /'brus mi chom pa'i skyon du 'gyur //
NK084(yu)006:1807: dgos ched don gyis ma bshad na //
NK084(yu)006:1808: rdzogs chen bya brtsal med pa la //
NK084(yu)006:1809: don med pa yi skyon du 'gyur //
NK084(yu)006:1811: yan lag bzhi ni rig pa rang grol las /
NK084(yu)006:1812: khyung chen mkha' lding lta bu'i blos //
NK084(yu)006:1813: don gyi khog rnams phub ste bshad //
NK084(yu)006:1814: stag mo 'chongs stangs shes rab blos //
NK084(yu)006:1815: don gyis sa chen bcad de bshad //
NK084(yu)006:1816: rus sbal nur 'gros lta bu'i blos //
NK084(yu)006:1817: yi ge'i 'bru rnams chom par bshad //
NK084(yu)006:1818: ces pa don gyi khog dbub /
NK084(yu)006:1821: man ngag gi don bsdu ba dang bzhi'o //
NK084(yu)006:1822: phun sum tshogs pa lnga'i chings kyis 'chad dgos te /
NK084(yu)006:1823: de yang thun mong ma yin pa dang /
NK084(yu)006:1824: thun mong gi gleng gzhi gang rung cig las mi 'byung la /
NK084(yu)006:1825: 'dir rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po gsang chen nges pa'i rgyud rnams thun mong ma yin pa dang /
NK084(yu)006:1826: thun mong ba gnyis su 'byung ba ni /
NK084(yu)006:1827: chos dbyings don gyi 'og min du /
NK084(yu)006:1828: rang byung gi rig pa'i ston pa 'pho 'gyur ma mchis pa /
NK084(yu)006:1829: chos blang ba dang dor ba med pa'i rang bzhin /
NK084(yu)006:1830: 'khor rang las tha mi dad pa ye shes rol pa'i 'khor te /
NK084(yu)006:1831: nyid la nyid ched du gleng bas 'di skad bdag
NK084(yu)006:1832: gis bshad pa'am bstan pa'i dus gcig na zhes 'byung
NK084(yu)006:1833: la / tshig gi rgyud de nyid gang du byung
NK084(yu)006:1834: bas nyams su len pa'i skabs su ston sdud tha
NK084(yu)006:1836: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na zhes gleng gzhi gnyis su bka' stsal pa yin no //
NK084(yu)006:1837: de dag cung zad mdor bsdus pas kyang gsang chen
NK084(yu)006:1838: sngags la slob pa'i rim pa mdor bstan pa tsam
NK084(yu)006:1839: zhig go nus pa'i dbang du byas nas blo gros
NK084(yu)006:1840: dang rtsol ba dman pa 'ag'i don du bstan pa'o
NK084(yu)006:1841: // de ltar rgyud don zab cing rgya che'i 'phags blos spyod yul gangs can 'tsho /
NK084(yu)006:1842: mkha' ltar rab zhi rnyog pa kun bral gzod nas 'dus ma byas //
NK084(yu)006:1843: ji snyed ji bzhin gzigs pa'i gsang chen shin tu rmad byung mtha' yas gang //
NK084(yu)006:1844: rgyal ba'i thugs rjes 'gro la snang ba'i gangs ri'i khrod 'dir cung zad gsal //
NK084(yu)006:1845: 'di lta'i dge ba 'od dkar rnyog med des //
NK084(yu)006:1846: rab rib rmongs pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa //
NK084(yu)006:1847: 'od gsal gdod ma'i snang ba mngon gyur nas //
NK084(yu)006:1848: phyam gcig 'gyur med zhing la spyod par shog /
NK084(yu)006:1849: tshul 'di skal bzang slob bu'i mchog gyur pa //
NK084(yu)006:1850: blo bzang dge ba'i 'byung gnas dam pa dang //
NK084(yu)006:1851: dad ldan gtong phod sri zhu'i mchog gyur pa //
NK084(yu)006:1852: sh+aakya ye shes bzang pos bskul ba'i ngor //
NK084(yu)006:1853: ji bzhin don gnyis spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
NK084(yu)006:1854: rgyud don zab mo rang bzhin mngon phyung nas //
NK084(yu)006:1855: gangs ri thod dkar rin chen snying po'i mgul //
NK084(yu)006:1856: o rgyan rdzong zhes bya ba'i gnas su bkod //
NK084(yu)006:1857: sngags kyi spyi don tshangs dbyangs 'brug sgra zhes bya ba /
NK084(yu)006:1858: dpal o rgyan gyi slob dpon blo ldan mchog sred kyis rjes su bzung zhing /
NK084(yu)006:1859: sngags dang pha rol phyin pa'i chos tshul rgya mtsho
NK084(yu)006:1860: la mang du thos shing legs par sbyangs pa'i me
NK084(yu)006:1861: tog rgyun chags pas blo'i pad mtsho gang bar byas
NK084(yu)006:1862: pa / theg pa mchog gi rnal 'byor pa klong chen rab 'byams kyis /
NK084(yu)006:1863: 'brug gi lo dbyar zla ra ba'i tshes brgyad bkra
NK084(yu)006:1864: shis kyi nyi ma shar ba la legs par bgyis
